pairs.target: Let all bitterness, wrath, anger, outcry, and slander, be put away from you, with all malice.

pairs.source: Pak-e ingan halus paguh tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa, ngin pilasiꞌ tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa, samah-samah nyeꞌ ngapun nyaꞌa, kodaꞌ Topaꞌ ngapun-e geh ingan pakai Kristus.
pairs.target: And be kind to one another, tender hearted, forgiving each other, just as God also in Christ forgave you.    Ephesians

pairs.source: Ingan inoh onak Topaꞌ deꞌ ngibalaꞌ-E, noh leh ngan nyeꞌ kagaꞌ nunaꞌ tilodan Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Be therefore imitators of God, as beloved children.

pairs.source: Oni sijaꞌ-e deꞌ nai ingan tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon, ngibalaꞌ inoh leh deꞌ jadin puꞌun suaꞌ pingunai ingan, samah kodaꞌ Yesus ngibalaꞌ ingan, Iyoh nyelah asong-E kobos saꞌan otoꞌ ngan-e jadin persembahan korban deꞌ paguh puat-e saꞌan Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Walk in love, even as Christ also loved you, and gave himself up for us, an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweet-smelling fragrance.

pairs.source: Ingan moꞌ jadin umat Topaꞌ, noh leh ngan nyeꞌ maꞌ ngaso nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e lawang odop nyeꞌ duoh maꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e sinunuh, maꞌ ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ pinganguak daang uluk ingan, saꞌ-e doiꞌ nyaꞌa sobot nang ingan nai oniꞌ deꞌ wat inoh.
pairs.target: But sexual immorality, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not even be mentioned among you, as becomes saints;

pairs.source: Wat inoh geh sina deꞌ koꞌis, sina deꞌ budua, sina deꞌ diꞌ-e sinunuh, dop-e suaꞌ-e deꞌ munoꞌ diꞌ-e patut ingan yaꞌ nang.   Ngibalik-e ingan nang sina bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: nor filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not appropriate; but rather giving of thanks.

pairs.source: Pilati nyeꞌ bonal-bonal-e: Nyaꞌa deꞌ nyonal, nyaꞌa deꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e sinunuh, nyaꞌa deꞌ pinganguak, suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ samah kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ nyomah tipaduaꞌ.   Nyaꞌa deꞌ kodaꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ diꞌ-e ponai jadin bigian soꞌ umat deꞌ obuah pilitah Kristus duoh Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Know this for sure, that no sexually immoral person, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, has any inheritance in the Kingdom of Christ and God.

pairs.source: Maꞌ ingan yaꞌ pogo odaꞌ sina deꞌ pibulaꞌ, dop-e oniꞌ deꞌ mutiꞌ leh deꞌ odaꞌ Topaꞌ yaꞌ ngukum nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e nunaꞌ oni deꞌ nang-E.
pairs.target: Let no one deceive you with empty words. For because of these things, the wrath of God comes on the children of disobedience.

pairs.source: Noh leh ngan-e maꞌ ingan bidingan duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ wat inoh.
pairs.target: Therefore don’t be partakers with them.

pairs.source: Deꞌ dioꞌ ingan idip daang mopung, pak-e adin ingan moꞌ jadin umat Topaꞌ deꞌ idip daang jawaꞌ.   Noh leh ngan ingan halus idip daang jawaꞌ,
pairs.target: For you were once darkness, but are now light in the Lord. Walk as children of light,

pairs.source: dop-e soꞌ jawaꞌ inohleh timul suaꞌ pingunai deꞌ paguh, deꞌ jujul duoh deꞌ bonal.
pairs.target: for the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth,

pairs.source: Kagaꞌ leh bonal-bonal oniꞌ deꞌ odaꞌ otin Topaꞌ sonang.
pairs.target: proving what is well pleasing to the Lord.

pairs.source: Maꞌ yaꞌ suwaꞌ nai pingunai deꞌ diꞌ-e biguna deꞌ nai nyaꞌa deꞌ idip daang mopung.   Ngibalik-e bitanga leh nang pingunai deꞌ munoꞌ salah.
pairs.target: Have no fellowship with the unfruitful deeds of darkness, but rather even reprove them.

pairs.source: Dop-e oniꞌ deꞌ nai odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ deꞌ suwan-suwan-e inoh, yaꞌ sobot-e tuang dasaꞌ geh.
pairs.target: For the things which are done by them in secret, it is a shame even to speak of.

pairs.source: Pak-e suaꞌ oni deꞌ moꞌ bitanga daang jawaꞌ yaꞌ tonga.
pairs.target: But all things, when they are reproved, are revealed by the light, for everything that reveals is light.

pairs.source: Dop-e jawaꞌ odaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ jadin tonga.   Yoh ngan ogiꞌ pingunang deꞌ in-e, “Mokat mey ingan deꞌ boꞌos.   Mokat soꞌ kobos ingan, Kristus yaꞌ jadin jawaꞌ saꞌan ingan.”
pairs.target: Therefore he says, “Awake, you who sleep, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you.”

pairs.source: Noh leh ngan nyeꞌ pilati bonal-bonal-e, wat ki nyeꞌ halus idip, maꞌ kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ budua, pak-e idip leh kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bijak.
pairs.target: Therefore watch carefully how you walk, not as unwise, but as wise;

pairs.source: Pakai leh suaꞌ onu deꞌ ogiꞌ ngan nyeꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ paguh, dop-e adin suaꞌ nyaꞌa nai oniꞌ deꞌ jaꞌat.
pairs.target: redeeming the time, because the days are evil.

pairs.source: Noh leh ngan ingan maꞌ yaꞌ budua, pak-e kagaꞌ leh sa ingan ngiloti oni deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Therefore don’t be foolish, but understand what the will of the Lord is.

pairs.source: Maꞌ ingan yaꞌ mabuk odaꞌ tuak angul, dop-e dapod pilusak idip ingan.   Pak-e idip ingan halus punuaꞌ odaꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Don’t be drunken with wine, in which is dissipation, but be filled with the Spirit,

pairs.source: Ngin leh simangat tuduꞌ dingan-dingan ingan pakai sina-sina lagu: Soꞌ Mazmur, soꞌ buk lagu, duoh pakai lagu soꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ.   Ngilagu leh daang otin deꞌ sonang ngan nyeꞌ mudi Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: speaking to one another in psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs; singing, and making melody in your heart to the Lord;

pairs.source: Silalu bisukul saꞌan oni sijaꞌ-e tuduꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ otoꞌ daang adon Yesus Kristus.
pairs.target: giving thanks always concerning all things in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, to God, even the Father;

pairs.source: Tunuak leh tuduꞌ siodop ingan, dop-e wat inoh leh wat-e ngan nyeꞌ pimodo tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: subjecting yourselves to one another in the fear of Christ.

pairs.source: Ingan bala sowon tunuak leh tuduꞌ bonon ingan masim-masim samah kodaꞌ ingan tunuak tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Wives, be subject to your own husbands, as to the Lord.

pairs.source: Dop-e bonon leh deꞌ jadin bak saꞌan sowon-e, samah kodaꞌ Kristus deꞌ jadin bak saꞌan uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ duoh Iyoh leh deꞌ jadin Laja Pinyilamat saꞌan uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ, deꞌ jadin gonan-E.
pairs.target: For the husband is the head of the wife, as Christ also is the head of the assembly, being himself the savior of the body.

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, samah kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tunuak tuduꞌ Kristus, watnoh geh daang suaꞌ oni, sowon tunuak tuduꞌ bonon.
pairs.target: But as the assembly is subject to Christ, so let the wives also be to their own husbands in everything.

pairs.source: Ingan bala bonon, ngibalaꞌ leh sowon ingan samah kodaꞌ Kristus ngibalaꞌ uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ duoh nyelah asong-E saꞌan odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ.
pairs.target: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the assembly, and gave himself up for it;

pairs.source: Kristus nai deꞌ wat inoh, sa uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ jadin nyaꞌa deꞌ jok-e Iyoh deꞌ kakuꞌ.   Kristus kibisig uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ pakai piꞌin baptis duoh Pingunang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: that he might sanctify it, having cleansed it by the washing of water with the word,

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, Kristus odaꞌ uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ inoh jadin sukup sangon-e deꞌ sulung jowin-E, pakai idip deꞌ bonal, doiꞌ nyaꞌa sobot nang iyoh nai oniꞌ deꞌ salah, duoh doiꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ kulang daꞌ-e.
pairs.target: that he might present the assembly to himself gloriously, not having spot or wrinkle or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without defect.

pairs.source: Wat noh geh bonon halus ngibalaꞌ sowon-e samah kodaꞌ yoh ngibalaꞌ polong odop-e.   Osi sijaꞌ-e deꞌ ngibalaꞌ sowon-e yoh ngibalaꞌ polong odop-e.
pairs.target: Even so husbands also ought to love their own wives as their own bodies. He who loves his own wife loves himself.

pairs.source: Dop-e doiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ buꞌui deꞌ polong odop-e.   Pak-e iyoh ngilaan polong-e duoh jaga-e, samah kodaꞌ Kristus jaga duoh ngilaan uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ.
pairs.target: For no man ever hated his own flesh; but nourishes and cherishes it, even as the Lord also does the assembly;

pairs.source: Dop-e otoꞌ bigian gonan-E.
pairs.target: because we are members of his body, of his flesh and bones.

pairs.source: Daang buk Kitab obuah nulis in-e, “Noh leh ngan nyaꞌa deꞌ dali buꞌu soꞌ samaꞌ sinoꞌ-e, yohmoꞌ tikuluk jadin niꞌ duoh sowon-e, yohmoꞌ soꞌ duwoh-e moꞌ jadin niꞌ.”
pairs.target: “For this cause a man will leave his father and mother, and will be joined to his wife. The two will become one flesh.”

pairs.source: Deꞌ obuah nulis daang buk Kitab inoh tuluap loti-e.   Pak-e okuꞌ sobot-e ngan kuꞌ tanon tentang Kristus duoh uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ-E.
pairs.target: This mystery is great, but I speak concerning Christ and of the assembly.

pairs.source: Bial-e wat inoh, oniꞌ deꞌ obuah nulis inoh tuang obuah-e geh ingan, deꞌ nang-e: Ingan bala bonon ngibalaꞌ leh sowon ingan kodaꞌ ingan ngibalaꞌ odop ingan, bala sowon halus pimodo tuduꞌ bonon-e.
pairs.target: Nevertheless each of you must also love his own wife even as himself; and let the wife see that she respects her husband.    Ephesians

pairs.source: Ingan deꞌ jadin onak, taat leh duoh oni deꞌ tanon pingoma ingan kodaꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ, dop-e inoh leh oniꞌ deꞌ bonal deꞌ patut nyeꞌ nai-e.
pairs.target: Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right.

pairs.source: Daang buk Kitab ogiꞌ pilitah deꞌ obuah nulis in-e, “Pimodo leh tuduꞌ samaꞌ sinoꞌ muꞌ.” Daang pilitah inoh leh Topaꞌ ngin janyi-e deꞌ sibungas-e daang-e deꞌ in-e:
pairs.target: “Honor your father and mother,” which is the first commandment with a promise:

pairs.source: “Sa ingan doon duoh umul ingan tuui deꞌ dunia.”
pairs.target: “that it may be well with you, and you may live long on the earth.”

pairs.source: Ingan bala samaꞌ maꞌ yaꞌ kanam kila onak-onak ingan odaꞌ tiwas.   Pak-e piala leh pakai pingajal duoh nasehat deꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: You fathers, don’t provoke your children to wrath, but nurture them in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.

pairs.source: Ingan bala kuli, taat leh duoh oni deꞌ tanon toke ingan deꞌ dunia, pakai kila deꞌ paguh, daang nyeꞌ pimodo duoh diꞌ nyeꞌ lawan oni deꞌ tanon-e, samah kodaꞌ ingan taat tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: Servants, be obedient to those who according to the flesh are your masters, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as to Christ;

pairs.source: Maꞌ nai oniꞌ jok-e takal ogiꞌ toke ingan deꞌ sinok ingan, madas ngan ingan yaꞌ nyonang otin-e.   Pak-e ingan deꞌ jadi kuli-kuli Kristus, nai leh oni deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ ingan sipunuaꞌ otin ingan.
pairs.target: not in the way of service only when eyes are on you, as men pleasers; but as servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;

pairs.source: Kiloja leh saꞌan toke ingan daang otin deꞌ doon, samah kodaꞌ ingan nai kiloja saꞌan Topaꞌ, idoh diꞌ-e saꞌan manusia.
pairs.target: with good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men;

pairs.source: Ingan puꞌan nang tibilang nyaꞌa, bait kuli, bait nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e kuli, moꞌ iyoh moꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ paguh, iyoh yaꞌ soꞌon pah-e soꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: knowing that whatever good thing each one does, he will receive the same again from the Lord, whether he is bound or free.

pairs.source: Ingan bala toke, nai leh wat inoh tuduꞌ kuli-kuli ingan, maꞌ yaꞌ ngegap ngangam-e.   Natong nyeꞌ, Topaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ jadin kuli duoh Topaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ jadin toke jok-e ogiꞌ niꞌ, yohleh Topaꞌ deꞌ siluga.   Iyoh diꞌ-e ningaꞌ ulah nyaꞌa.
pairs.target: You masters, do the same things to them, and give up threatening, knowing that he who is both their Master and yours is in heaven, and there is no partiality with him.

pairs.source: Piobuaꞌ-e okuꞌ sibaya-e, ingan halus dolas ngan kuasa deꞌ soꞌon soꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Finally, be strong in the Lord, and in the strength of his might.

pairs.source: Pakai leh suaꞌ bikokas polang deꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ deꞌ ngin-E tuduꞌ ingan, saꞌ ingan taan lawan Laja Muat Munua deꞌ yaꞌ ngakal, nipu ingan.
pairs.target: Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

pairs.source: Dop-e otoꞌ diꞌ toꞌ bijuang lawan musuh deꞌ ogiꞌ toding doyaꞌ-e, pak-e otoꞌ lawan suaꞌ kuasa muat munua deꞌ nguasa joman deꞌ jaꞌat adin.   Otoꞌ lawan suaꞌ gamut deꞌ jaꞌat deꞌ nguasa auu longit.
pairs.target: For our wrestling is not against flesh and blood, but against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of the darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenly places.

pairs.source: Noh leh ngan ingan pakai bikokas polang deꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ ngan ingan bipolang, saꞌ-e takal onu deꞌ jaꞌat nog, ingan taan lawan musuh.   Takal ingan moꞌ bijuang nog obuaꞌ-e, ingan aluaꞌ totap mujuag togap wat-wat-e.
pairs.target: Therefore put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to withstand in the evil day, and, having done all, to stand.

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan ingan halus mujuag togap-togap-e odaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ bonal soꞌ Topaꞌ jadin kodaꞌ soot kupuang deꞌ pakai ingan, duoh oniꞌ deꞌ adil deꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ jadin kodaꞌ bojuh bosi deꞌ pakai ingan.
pairs.target: Stand therefore, having the utility belt of truth buckled around your waist, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness,

pairs.source: Wat inoh geh silalu siap magah Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ tentang idip bidanah, samah kodaꞌ kasut deꞌ pakai ingan.
pairs.target: and having fitted your feet with the preparation of the Good News of peace;

pairs.source: Tibilang konu, pakai bisayaꞌ ingan tuduꞌ Topaꞌ, saꞌ-e jadin utap ngan nyeꞌ mulaꞌ siduduꞌ panah opui Laja Muat Munua.
pairs.target: above all, taking up the shield of faith, with which you will be able to quench all the fiery darts of the evil one.

pairs.source: Natong nyeꞌ nang Topaꞌ moꞌ nyilamat ingan soꞌ dosa.   Inoh deꞌ yaꞌ jadin kodaꞌ topi bosi deꞌ pakai ingan.   Wat inoh geh ingan pakai Pingunang Topaꞌ ngan ingan tulung odop ingan.   Inoh yaꞌ jadin kodaꞌ podang deꞌ naꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ deꞌ tongan ingan.
pairs.target: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God;

pairs.source: Daang suaꞌ oniꞌ nyeꞌ silalu bidoa mitiaꞌ tulung deꞌ Topaꞌ.   Pakai tibilang konu ngan nyeꞌ bidoa odaꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ mipin ingan.   Ingan halus silalu siap, maꞌ yaꞌ buwon-buwon bidoa saꞌan suaꞌ umat Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: with all prayer and requests, praying at all times in the Spirit, and being watchful to this end in all perseverance and requests for all the saints:

pairs.source: Bidoa geh saꞌan okuꞌ, sa takal okuꞌ sina, Topaꞌ tanon tuduꞌ okuꞌ sina-sina deꞌ bonal deꞌ patut kuꞌ nang-e.   Saꞌ okuꞌ bilani sina tentang Gah deꞌ Paguh inoh deꞌ aluaꞌ diꞌ nyaꞌa puꞌan-e.
pairs.target: on my behalf, that utterance may be given to me in opening my mouth, to make known with boldness the mystery of the Good News,

pairs.source: Gah deꞌ Paguh inoh leh deꞌ odaꞌ Topaꞌ okuꞌ ponu magah-e, luban inoh leh adin okuꞌ moꞌ obuah jel.   Bidoa saꞌan okuꞌ saꞌ kuꞌ bilani sina tentang Gah deꞌ Paguh inoh, wat inoh leh deꞌ patut okuꞌ nai-e.
pairs.target: for which I am an ambassador in chains; that in it I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.

pairs.source: Sa ingan puꞌan suaꞌ-e tentang okuꞌ, okuꞌ moꞌ odaꞌ Tikhikus madih deꞌ ngibalaꞌ toꞌ deꞌ jadin kuli Topaꞌ deꞌ taat daang kiloja-e, tanon tuduꞌ ingan tentang okuꞌ, oni wat kuꞌ, oni deꞌ nai kuꞌ.
pairs.target: But that you also may know my affairs, how I am doing, Tychicus, the beloved brother and faithful servant in the Lord, will make known to you all things;

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan kuꞌ pait iyoh tuduꞌ ingan saꞌ-e tanon gah koꞌih, saꞌ ingan diꞌ-e bigaduh natong koꞌih.
pairs.target: whom I have sent to you for this very purpose, that you may know our state, and that he may comfort your hearts.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bidoa sa Topaꞌ Samaꞌ duoh Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus tulung ingan, madih ayua, saꞌ ingan idip bidanah, samah-samah ngibalaꞌ tipan siodop ingan, duoh totap bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: Peace be to the brothers, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bidoa geh saꞌ Topaꞌ ngin bilokat tuduꞌ ingan deꞌ ngibalaꞌ Topaꞌ, pakai kila ngibalaꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e ponai obuaꞌ.   Salam soꞌ okuꞌ, Paulus    FILIPI
pairs.target: Grace be with all those who love our Lord Jesus Christ with incorruptible love. Amen.    Philippians

pairs.source: Sulat soꞌ koꞌih duwoh, Paulus duoh Timotius, kuli Kristus Yesus.  Koꞌih pait sulat itih tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ jok-e Topaꞌ deꞌ kakuꞌ, deꞌ loꞌo deꞌ kota Filipi, dop-e moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus.  Wat inoh geh tuduꞌ pimipin duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ tukang tulung pimipin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ.
pairs.target: Paul and Timothy, servants of Jesus Christ; To all the saints in Christ Jesus who are at Philippi, with the overseers  and servants:

pairs.source: Koꞌih bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ otoꞌ duoh Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus ngin bilokat duoh idip bidanah tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: Grace to you, and peace from God, our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ silalu bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ kuꞌ, tibilang kuꞌ natong ingan.
pairs.target: I thank my God whenever I remember you,

pairs.source: Tibilang kuꞌ bidoa saꞌan ingan tuduꞌ Topaꞌ, okuꞌ bidoa daang otin deꞌ doon.
pairs.target: always in every request of mine on behalf of you all, making my requests with joy,

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ, dop-e soꞌ sibungas ingan bisayaꞌ nog adin ingan suwaꞌ magah Gah deꞌ Paguh tentang Yesus.
pairs.target: for your partnership in furtherance of the Good News from the first day until now;

pairs.source: Sukup kuꞌ bisayaꞌ: Odop Topaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ dioꞌ nai kiloja deꞌ paguh deꞌ uun ingan, Iyoh geh deꞌ yaꞌ nah-nah nai kiloja inoh nog-e jadi takal Kristus Yesus paliꞌ nog.
pairs.target: being confident of this very thing, that he who began a good work in you will complete it until the day of Jesus Christ.

pairs.source: Kan-e moꞌ patut okuꞌ bipikil deꞌ in inoh tentang ingan, dop-e ingan silalu ogiꞌ daang otin kuꞌ, dop-e ingan suwaꞌ nai kiloja deꞌ odaꞌ Topaꞌ okuꞌ nai-e, bait takal okuꞌ nuaꞌ Gah deꞌ Paguh duoh bitanga oniꞌ deꞌ bonal soꞌ Gah deꞌ Paguh inoh, bait takal okuꞌ obuah jel deꞌ wat itih adin.
pairs.target: It is even right for me to think this way on behalf of all of you, because I have you in my heart, because, both in my bonds and in the defense and confirmation of the Good News, you all are partakers with me of grace.

pairs.source: Topaꞌ puꞌan nang okuꞌ sukup-sukup jobong tuduꞌ suaꞌ ingan pakai kila ngibalaꞌ deꞌ soꞌ Kristus Yesus.
pairs.target: For God is my witness, how I long after all of you in the tender mercies of Christ Jesus.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ ingan makin ngibalaꞌ Topaꞌ duoh ngibalaꞌ siodop ingan.  Okuꞌ bidoa geh saꞌ ingan puꞌan oni deꞌ bonal duoh makin bijak.
pairs.target: This I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and all discernment;

pairs.source: Simoꞌ-e moꞌ wat inoh, ingan ponai pilih oni deꞌ paguh, saꞌ ingan idip bisig duoh doiꞌ deꞌ salah takal Kristus paliꞌ nog.
pairs.target: so that you may approve the things that are excellent; that you may be sincere and without offense to the day of Christ;

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ idip ingan punuaꞌ odaꞌ pingunai deꞌ bonal deꞌ obuah nai odaꞌ kuasa Yesus Kristus deꞌ ogiꞌ daang ingan.  Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, nyaꞌa yaꞌ pimodo duoh mudi Topaꞌ takal-e ningaꞌ idip ingan.
pairs.target: being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are through Jesus Christ, to the glory and praise of God.

pairs.source: Madih ayua kuꞌ, saꞌ ingan puꞌan-e, oni deꞌ obuah okuꞌ datiꞌ, makin odaꞌ bitamah bogoꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Now I desire to have you know, brothers, that the things which happened to me have turned out rather to the progress of the Good News;

pairs.source: Yoh ngan-e suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ jaga istana, baya nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon deꞌ ogiꞌ deꞌ kota itih, puꞌan nang okuꞌ obuah jel dop-e okuꞌ magah gah tentang Kristus.
pairs.target: so that it became evident to the whole palace guard, and to all the rest, that my bonds are in Christ;

pairs.source: Adin ngan okuꞌ obuah jel, bogoꞌ pinunaꞌ Kristus deꞌ makin bitamah bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.  Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ jadin makin bilani duoh diꞌ-e tolu magah Pingunang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: and that most of the brothers in the Lord, being confident through my bonds, are more abundantly bold to speak the word of God without fear.

pairs.source: Tok ogiꞌ soꞌ odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ deꞌ magah tentang Kristus dop-e yoh siniaꞌ tuduꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai kuꞌ yohmoꞌ yaꞌ bikaꞌi bikalah duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon, pak-e ogiꞌ geh odop-e deꞌ bokon deꞌ magah tentang Kristus daang niat deꞌ paguh.
pairs.target: Some indeed preach Christ even out of envy and strife, and some also out of good will.

pairs.source: Odop-e deꞌ paguh otin-e magah tentang Kristus dop-e yoh ngibalaꞌ okuꞌ.  Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ puꞌan nang okuꞌ ogiꞌ daang jel itih ngan kuꞌ nuaꞌ Gah deꞌ Paguh inoh.
pairs.target: The former insincerely preach Christ from selfish ambition, thinking that they add affliction to my chains;

pairs.source: Pak-e ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon deꞌ magah tentang Kristus daang niat deꞌ diꞌ-e paguh; Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ nai wat inoh, saꞌ okuꞌ bitamah susah daang jel.
pairs.target: but the latter out of love, knowing that I am appointed for the defense of the Good News.

pairs.source: Saꞌan okuꞌ idoh diꞌ-e wat, odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ magah tentang Kristus daang niat deꞌ jaꞌat keh, daang niat deꞌ paguh keh, okuꞌ doon, deꞌ penting Kristus obuah magah.  Yohmoꞌ okuꞌ totap yaꞌ doon,
pairs.target: What does it matter? Only that in every way, whether in pretense or in truth, Christ is proclaimed. I rejoice in this, yes, and will rejoice.

pairs.source: dop-e okuꞌ puꞌan nang odaꞌ doa-doa ingan duoh ngan kuꞌ obuah tulung odaꞌ Iyang Yesus Kristus, okuꞌ yaꞌ obuah pilopas soꞌ jel.
pairs.target: For I know that this will turn out to my salvation, through your prayers and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,

pairs.source: Deꞌ laꞌan kuꞌ duoh deꞌ alap kuꞌ, maꞌ sape okuꞌ yaꞌ diꞌ kuꞌ nai tugas kuꞌ, saꞌ diꞌ kuꞌ jadin dasaꞌ deꞌ sulung jowin Topaꞌ.  Pak-e deꞌ laꞌan kuꞌ saꞌ-a adin nog siniaꞌ sijaꞌ-e okuꞌ totap telus bilani kodaꞌ dioꞌ.  Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, soꞌ pingidip okuꞌ, nyaꞌa dapod yaꞌ mudi adon Kristus, bait takal okuꞌ aluaꞌ idip, atou takal okuꞌ moꞌ kobos.
pairs.target: according to my earnest expectation and hope, that I will in no way be disappointed, but with all boldness, as always, now also Christ will be magnified in my body, whether by life, or by death.

pairs.source: Dop-e saꞌan okuꞌ, simoꞌ okuꞌ idip, idip kuꞌ saꞌan Kristus, duoh simoꞌ okuꞌ kobos, okuꞌ utung.
pairs.target: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.

pairs.source: Pak-e moꞌ kuꞌ aluaꞌ idip daang dunia itih, okuꞌ yaꞌ nah-nah nai kiloja deꞌ ogiꞌ guna-e.  Yoh ngan diꞌ kuꞌ puꞌan ki deꞌ halus okuꞌ pilih-e, lobih paguh kuꞌ idip atou lobih paguh okuꞌ kobos.
pairs.target: But if I live on in the flesh, this will bring fruit from my work; yet I don’t know what I will choose.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ obuah nalik soꞌ duwoh kawa.  Okuꞌ yaꞌ buu soꞌ dunia itih ngan kuꞌ yaꞌ loꞌo duoh Kristus, dop-e inoh leh deꞌ sukup paguh-e.
pairs.target: But I am in a dilemma between the two, having the desire to depart and be with Christ, which is far better.

pairs.source: Pak-e saꞌ okuꞌ dapod tulung ingan, okuꞌ aluaꞌ pilelu totap loꞌo daang dunia itih.
pairs.target: Yet, to remain in the flesh is more needful for your sake.

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan okuꞌ bisayaꞌ, okuꞌ puꞌan nang Topaꞌ yaꞌ odaꞌ okuꞌ totap idip.  Iyoh odaꞌ okuꞌ loꞌo samah-samah duoh ingan, ngan kuꞌ tulung odaꞌ ingan makin bonal-bonal bisayaꞌ duoh sonang dop-e ingan bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: Having this confidence, I know that I will remain, yes, and remain with you all, for your progress and joy in the faith,

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh takal kuꞌ nog lagiꞌ tuduꞌ ingan, ingan deꞌ moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus, yaꞌ mudi-E takal ingan ningaꞌ oni deꞌ nai-E daang idip okuꞌ.
pairs.target: that your rejoicing may abound in Christ Jesus in me through my presence with you again.

pairs.source: Adin, deꞌ penting saꞌan ingan nai-e, idip leh nunaꞌ Gah deꞌ Paguh tentang Kristus.  Moꞌ-e moꞌ wat inoh, moꞌ nyam diꞌ kuꞌ tapod yaꞌ odi tuduꞌ ingan, okuꞌ dapod ngojit nang ingan totap togap idip daang niꞌ tujuan deꞌ samah.  Wat inoh geh ingan bijuang samah-samah sa' bisayaꞌ ingan deꞌ nog soꞌ Gah deꞌ Paguh inoh totap togap.
pairs.target: Only let your way of life be worthy of the Good News of Christ, that, whether I come and see you or am absent, I may hear of your state, that you stand firm in one spirit, with one soul striving for the faith of the Good News;

pairs.source: Maꞌ tolu deꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ lawan ingan.  Ingan halus bilani, saꞌ odop-e deꞌ lawan ingan deꞌ munoꞌ puꞌan nang odop-e yaꞌ alah.  Dop-e odop Topaꞌ leh deꞌ odaꞌ ingan monang.
pairs.target: and in nothing frightened by the adversaries, which is for them a proof of destruction, but to you of salvation, and that from God.

pairs.source: Dop-e Topaꞌ sukup paguh-e duoh ingan, Iyoh odaꞌ ingan bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus, pak-e idoh diꞌ-e jok-e inoh, Iyoh odaꞌ-e geh ingan susah jolaꞌ ngan-e bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: Because it has been granted to you on behalf of Christ, not only to believe in him, but also to suffer on his behalf,

pairs.source: Susah jolaꞌ deꞌ obuah ingan adin, samah duoh susah jolaꞌ deꞌ kilin ingan obuah okuꞌ, nog adin aluaꞌ geh ingan ngojit-e nang okuꞌ aluaꞌ susah jolaꞌ.
pairs.target: having the same conflict which you saw in me, and now hear is in me.    Philippians

pairs.source: Otin kila ingan moꞌ jadin togap dop-e ingan moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus.  Ingan obuah ngilibul dop-e Kristus ngibalaꞌ ingan.  Ingan moꞌ ogiꞌ samah-samah duoh Iyang Topaꞌ.  Ingan moꞌ tilimaꞌ pilasiꞌ soꞌ Kristus dop-e Iyoh paguh.  Inoh leh ngan,
pairs.target: If therefore there is any exhortation in Christ, if any consolation of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any tender mercies and compassion,

pairs.source: nai leh odaꞌ otin kuꞌ bonal-bonal doon pakai wat itih: Pikil leh oniꞌ deꞌ samah.  Ngibalaꞌ leh siodop ingan.  Idip leh niꞌ kila duoh niꞌ tujuan deꞌ samah.
pairs.target: make my joy full, by being like-minded, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind;

pairs.source: Maꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ odaꞌ odop nyeꞌ utung sadiꞌ nyeꞌ atou madas ngan nyeꞌ yaꞌ bilagah odop nyeꞌ.  Pak-e pakai otin deꞌ diꞌ-e samuh, angap leh nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon lobih penting soꞌ odop nyeꞌ.
pairs.target: doing nothing through rivalry or through conceit, but in humility, each counting others better than himself;

pairs.source: Pikil nyeꞌ oni deꞌ penting saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon, idoh diꞌ-e jok-e deꞌ penting saꞌan odop nyeꞌ sadiꞌ nyeꞌ.
pairs.target: each of you not just looking to his own things, but each of you also to the things of others.

pairs.source: Oni deꞌ nai ingan halus samah duoh oni deꞌ moꞌ nai Kristus:
pairs.target: Have this in your mind, which was also in Christ Jesus,

pairs.source: Iyoh sibonal-e samah duoh Topaꞌ, pak-e nunaꞌ deꞌ laꞌan odop-E, Iyoh diꞌ-e pakai kuasa-E deꞌ samah duoh Topaꞌ sibalang saꞌan odop-E sadiꞌ-E.
pairs.target: who, existing in the form of God, didn’t consider equality with God a thing to be grasped,

pairs.source: Pak-e Yesus posan suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ kakuꞌ-E, Iyoh moꞌ jadin samah kodaꞌ kuli.  Iyoh obuah bilanak jadin manusia kodaꞌ manusia deꞌ bokon.
pairs.target: but emptied himself, taking the form of a servant, being made in the likeness of men.

pairs.source: Takal Iyoh idip samah kodaꞌ manusia, Iyoh odaꞌ odop-e jadin nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e penting, Iyoh taat tuduꞌ Topaꞌ sape Iyoh sangup kobos, kobos obuah masak deꞌ tun salip.
pairs.target: And being found in human form, he humbled himself, becoming obedient to death, yes, the death of the cross.

pairs.source: Yohleh ngan Topaꞌ odaꞌ Iyoh obuah pimodo lobih soꞌ osi sijaꞌ-e deꞌ bokon, duoh odaꞌ adon-E paling ayuh kuasa-E soꞌ suaꞌ adon oniꞌ deꞌ bokon.
pairs.target: Therefore God also highly exalted him, and gave to him the name which is above every name;

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, Topaꞌ yaꞌ odaꞌ Yesus obuah pimodo odaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ deꞌ siluga, duoh deꞌ tun tana', baya deꞌ libuaꞌ tana'.
pairs.target: that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of those in heaven, those on earth, and those under the earth,

pairs.source: Suaꞌ nyaꞌa tuang yaꞌ ngakuꞌ-e geh nang Yesus Kristus inoh Topaꞌ.  Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh nyaꞌa mudi Topaꞌ Samaꞌ.
pairs.target: and that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.

pairs.source: Madih ayua deꞌ sukup kuꞌ ngibalaꞌ-e, soꞌ noꞌuh-e nog adin ingan silalu taat.  Wat inoh geh ingan halus totap bijuang ngan ingan idip nunaꞌ wat-e deꞌ patut saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ obuah nyilamat.  Ingan halus nai deꞌ wat inoh daang kila deꞌ sukup pimodo-e tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.  Maꞌ ingan yaꞌ nai deꞌ wat inoh jok-e takal okuꞌ ogiꞌ duoh ingan, pak-e adin takal okuꞌ doiꞌ duoh ingan, ingan halus nai oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ lobih bonal-bonal-e lagi.
pairs.target: So then, my beloved, even as you have always obeyed, not only in my presence, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.

pairs.source: Odop Topaꞌ deꞌ kiloja daang otin ingan odaꞌ ingan laꞌan duoh taan nai oniꞌ deꞌ nyonang otin Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: For it is God who works in you both to will and to work, for his good pleasure.

pairs.source: Nai leh suaꞌ oniꞌ diꞌ nyeꞌ bikutuk-bigonom duoh diꞌ nyeꞌ bikalah,
pairs.target: Do all things without murmurings and disputes,

pairs.source: saꞌ-a idip ingan bonal duoh doiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ ponai yaꞌ nyalah ingan.  Ingan, onak-onak Topaꞌ deꞌ idip doiꞌ salah-e deꞌ uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ jaꞌat duoh bidosa, yohleh ngan ingan halus idip bonal deꞌ uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ kodaꞌ bitang-bitang deꞌ jawaꞌ deꞌ odaꞌ dunia deꞌ mopung jadin jawaꞌ.
pairs.target: that you may become blameless and harmless, children of God without defect in the middle of a crooked and perverse generation, among whom you are seen as lights in the world,

pairs.source: Kagong togap-togap-e pingunang deꞌ ngin idip sibonal-e, saꞌ-a takal tiaꞌ ijoꞌ Kristus paliꞌ nog, okuꞌ dapod bilagah tentang ingan dop-e kiloja' deꞌ ulih-ulih kuꞌ nai-e ogiꞌ guna-e duoh biasil.
pairs.target: holding up the word of life; that I may have something to boast in the day of Christ, that I didn’t run in vain nor labor in vain.

pairs.source: Moꞌ nyam okuꞌ halus kobos obuah ngabos ngan kuꞌ jadin korban, duoh doyaꞌ kuꞌ kodaꞌ deꞌ duwan deꞌ tun persembahan deꞌ ngin ingan tuduꞌ Topaꞌ dop-e ingan bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ-E, okuꞌ bisukul duoh doon samah-samah duoh ingan.
pairs.target: Yes, and if I am poured out on the sacrifice and service of your faith, I rejoice, and rejoice with you all.

pairs.source: Wat inoh geh ingan halus bisukul duoh doon samah-samah duoh okuꞌ.
pairs.target: In the same way, you also rejoice, and rejoice with me.

pairs.source: Deꞌ alap kuꞌ diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ tuui Topaꞌ Yesus bukaꞌ olan saꞌ okuꞌ dapod pait Timotius odaꞌ odi tuduꞌ ingan.  Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, moꞌ nyam Timotius paliꞌ lagiꞌ katiꞌ, okuꞌ dapod ngojit gah tentang ingan soꞌ iyoh deꞌ odaꞌ kila kuꞌ sonang.
pairs.target: But I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you soon, that I also may be cheered up when I know how you are doing.

pairs.source: Jok-e Timotius leh deꞌ niꞌ nyam kila-e duoh okuꞌ, deꞌ bonal-bonal pilati oni deꞌ pilelu ingan.
pairs.target: For I have no one else like-minded, who will truly care about you.

pairs.source: Nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon jok-e ngulus hal odop-e sijaꞌ-e, yoh diꞌ-e piduli oni deꞌ penting saꞌan Yesus Kristus.
pairs.target: For they all seek their own, not the things of Jesus Christ.

pairs.source: Ingan tuang moꞌ puꞌan ingan geh nang moꞌ ogiꞌ bukti-e Timotius tapod toꞌ bisayaꞌ daꞌ-e.  Iyoh moꞌ ulih-ulih kiloja samah-samah duoh okuꞌ ngan-e magah Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ.  Iyoh tulung okuꞌ kodaꞌ onak deꞌ tulung samaꞌ-a.
pairs.target: But you know the proof of him, that, as a child serves a father, so he served with me in furtherance of the Good News.

pairs.source: Yohleh ngan okuꞌ alap okuꞌ dapod pait iyoh likas-likas-e odi tuduꞌ ingan, takal okuꞌ moꞌ puꞌan oni deꞌ yaꞌ motod pingadel tentang okuꞌ.
pairs.target: Therefore I hope to send him at once, as soon as I see how it will go with me.

pairs.source: Pak-e okuꞌ bisayaꞌ Topaꞌ yaꞌ tulung okuꞌ saꞌ okuꞌ dapod likas-likas odi nomi ingan.
pairs.target: But I trust in the Lord that I myself also will come shortly.

pairs.source: Ingan moꞌ pait Epafroditus madih toꞌ deꞌ samah-samah bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ ngan-e tulung okuꞌ.  Iyoh moꞌ nai kiloja duoh bijuang samah-samah duoh okuꞌ.  Adin, okuꞌ odaꞌ iyoh paliꞌ tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: But I counted it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother, fellow worker, fellow soldier, and your apostle and servant of my need;

pairs.source: Iyoh moꞌ sikiya nyam-e jobong tuduꞌ suaꞌ ingan.  Iyoh tuang susah geh nyam kila-e dop-e ingan moꞌ ngojit gah nang iyoh monam.
pairs.target: since he longed for you all, and was very troubled, because you had heard that he was sick.

pairs.source: Tok bonal iyoh ogiꞌ sidoh-e monam tadoꞌ-e yaꞌ doiꞌ asong-e.  Pak-e Topaꞌ masiꞌ idoh diꞌ-e tuduꞌ iyoh sijaꞌ-e, pak-e tuduꞌ okuꞌ geh, saꞌ kila kuꞌ diꞌ-e bitamah ngilobuꞌ.
pairs.target: For indeed he was sick, nearly to death, but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, that I might not have sorrow on sorrow.

pairs.source: Yoh leh ngan okuꞌ odaꞌ yoh likas-likas paliꞌ tuduꞌ ingan, saꞌ-e takal ingan ningaꞌ iyoh, kila ingan munuas duoh otin okuꞌ tuang bidanah geh.
pairs.target: I have sent him therefore the more diligently, that, when you see him again, you may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.

pairs.source: Tilimaꞌ leh iyoh daang kila deꞌ sonang, dop-e iyoh madih otoꞌ deꞌ samah-samah bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.  Pimodo leh tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kodaꞌ iyoh inoh.
pairs.target: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all joy, and hold such in honor,

pairs.source: Iyoh tadoꞌ-e yaꞌ doiꞌ asong-e ngan-e nai kiloja Kristus.  Iyoh diꞌ-e nyayang asong-e ngan-e nai tugas deꞌ ngin ingan tuduꞌ-e odaꞌ tulung okuꞌ, dop-e ingan doiꞌ sinok okuꞌ.
pairs.target: because for the work of Christ he came near to death, risking his life to supply that which was lacking in your service toward me.    Philippians

pairs.source: Madih ayua kuꞌ deꞌ samah-samah bisayaꞌ, doon leh dop-e ingan moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Topaꞌ.  Daang sonang otin okuꞌ nulis lagiꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ dioꞌ deꞌ moꞌ ngajal kuꞌ tuduꞌ ingan, saꞌ ingan obuah jaga soꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ jaꞌat.
pairs.target: Finally, my brothers, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you, to me indeed is not tiresome, but for you it is safe.

pairs.source: Ati-ati nyeꞌ tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ jaꞌat, idip-e samah kodaꞌ kosuang.  Nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ paksa nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus saꞌ-e bisunat.
pairs.target: Beware of the dogs, beware of the evil workers, beware of the false circumcision.

pairs.source: Tiap otoꞌ deꞌ mutiꞌ leh nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ tilimaꞌ bisunat deꞌ tok, dop-e otoꞌ moꞌ bisayaꞌ.  Iyang Topaꞌ deꞌ nutuan otoꞌ ngan-e odaꞌ otoꞌ nyomah Topaꞌ.  Otoꞌ doon odaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ nai Kristus Yesus saꞌan otoꞌ.  Otoꞌ diꞌ toꞌ bilagah atulan-atulan deꞌ nai manusia.
pairs.target: For we are the circumcision, who worship God in the Spirit, and rejoice in Christ Jesus, and have no confidence in the flesh;

pairs.source: Sibonal-e okuꞌ lobih bogoꞌ alasan ngan kuꞌ yaꞌ bialap deꞌ atulan-atulan deꞌ nai manusia, lobih soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ deꞌ pikil nang odop-e ponai bialap deꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ.
pairs.target: though I myself might have confidence even in the flesh. If any other man thinks that he has confidence in the flesh, I yet more:

pairs.source: Okuꞌ obuah bisunat takal umul kuꞌ moih onu.  Okuꞌ obuah bilanak soꞌ bangsa Israel, soꞌ suku Benyamin, okuꞌ ulang Ibrani asli.  Okuꞌ sukup taat tuduꞌ atulan-atulan Topaꞌ deꞌ nulis nabi Musa.  Okuꞌ soꞌ uluk ulang Farisi.
pairs.target: circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews; concerning the law, a Pharisee;

pairs.source: Okuꞌ simangat pijolaꞌ uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus.  Daang hal nunaꞌ atulan agama Yahudi, susuaꞌ-a kuꞌ nunaꞌ-e.
pairs.target: concerning zeal, persecuting the assembly; concerning the righteousness which is in the law, found blameless.

pairs.source: Pak-e takal okuꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus, suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ nai kuꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ, deꞌ dioꞌ kuꞌ angap nang utung, adin kuꞌ angap nang lugi.
pairs.target: However, I consider those things that were gain to me as a loss for Christ.

pairs.source: Adin suaꞌ oniꞌ okuꞌ angap lugi, ngan kuꞌ moꞌ piluh Kristus Yesus, Topaꞌ kuꞌ deꞌ lobih biloga-e soꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ.  Luban kuꞌ piluh Kristus, okuꞌ pilopas suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ kakuꞌ kuꞌ duoh angap inoh umang, saꞌ kuꞌ kakuꞌ Kristus,
pairs.target: Yes most certainly, and I count all things to be a loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus, my Lord, for whom I suffered the loss of all things, and count them nothing but refuse, that I may gain Christ

pairs.source: duoh okuꞌ bonal-bonal idip niꞌ duoh Kristus.  Oni' deꞌ munoꞌ jadi, idoh diꞌ-e odaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ bonal deꞌ nai kuꞌ ngan okuꞌ taat nunaꞌ atulan-atulan Topaꞌ deꞌ nulis nabi Musa, pak-e ngan okuꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.  Topaꞌ moꞌ ngibonal okuꞌ, takal okuꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: and be found in him, not having a righteousness of my own, that which is of the law, but that which is through faith in Christ, the righteousness which is from God by faith;

pairs.source: Deꞌ kalik kuꞌ adin, saꞌ okuꞌ piluh Kristus duoh ngoon kuasa deꞌ odaꞌ Yesus paliꞌ idip.  Okuꞌ tuang laꞌan kuꞌ geh ngoon susah jolaꞌ deꞌ ngoon-E.  Okuꞌ moꞌ jadin samah kodaꞌ Iyoh, deꞌ siap susah jolaꞌ nog-e kobos.
pairs.target: that I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, becoming conformed to his death;

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, okuꞌ alap Topaꞌ tuang yaꞌ odaꞌ-e geh okuꞌ paliꞌ idip soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kobos.
pairs.target: if by any means I may attain to the resurrection from the dead.

pairs.source: Idoh diꞌ kuꞌ nang odop kuꞌ moꞌ biasil nai oniꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ, atou nang odop kuꞌ moꞌ sukup doiꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ kulang.  Pak-e okuꞌ diꞌ kuꞌ mokuaꞌ-mokuaꞌ bijuang ngan kuꞌ yaꞌ soꞌon oni deꞌ moꞌ nyidia Kristus Yesus.  Inoh leh tujuan Iyoh moꞌ pilih okuꞌ saꞌan odop-E.
pairs.target: Not that I have already obtained, or am already made perfect; but I press on, that I may take hold of that for which also I was taken hold of by Christ Jesus.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, idoh diꞌ kuꞌ nang odop kuꞌ moꞌ soꞌon suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ.  Pak-e ogiꞌ niꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai kuꞌ, okuꞌ togan suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ oma, okuꞌ moꞌ ngajah suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ deꞌ yaꞌ nog.
pairs.target: Brothers, I don’t regard myself as yet having taken hold, but one thing I do. Forgetting the things which are behind, and stretching forward to the things which are before,

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan okuꞌ kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ ulih-ulih bikoduh nog galis piobuaꞌ-e ngan kuꞌ yaꞌ soꞌon oni deꞌ moꞌ nyidia Topaꞌ sa'an Okuꞌ.  Oni' deꞌ nyidia-E inoh yohleh idip deꞌ siluga.  Inoh leh deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ takal Iyoh mogan otoꞌ odaꞌ otoꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus Kristus.
pairs.target: I press on toward the goal for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.

pairs.source: Suaꞌ otoꞌ deꞌ tuꞌuh daang bisayaꞌ, otoꞌ halus bipikil wat inoh.  Pak-e simoꞌ-e ogiꞌ deꞌ soꞌ ingan deꞌ okon in pikil-e, odop Topaꞌ deꞌ yaꞌ nelang tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: Let us therefore, as many as are perfect, think this way. If in anything you think otherwise, God will also reveal that to you.

pairs.source: Deꞌ penting otoꞌ halus silalu idip nunaꞌ pingajal Topaꞌ, kodaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ nai otoꞌ nog adin.
pairs.target: Nevertheless, to the extent that we have already attained, let us walk by the same rule. Let us be of the same mind.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, nunaꞌ negeh soto idip deꞌ bonal deꞌ bitanga kuꞌ.  Nunaꞌ nyeꞌ geh wat idip nyaꞌa deꞌ idip nunaꞌ soto idip koꞌih.
pairs.target: Brothers, be imitators together of me, and note those who walk this way, even as you have us for an example.

pairs.source: Moꞌ paliꞌ-paliꞌ kuꞌ tanon tuduꞌ ingan, nang bogoꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ idip nai oniꞌ deꞌ lawan Kristus.  Adin daang kuꞌ siꞌian, okuꞌ tanon lagiꞌ tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: For many walk, of whom I told you often, and now tell you even weeping, as the enemies of the cross of Christ,

pairs.source: Piobuaꞌ idip nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ yaꞌ mutuab, dop-e odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ gati Topaꞌ pakai oniꞌ deꞌ kanuas odop-e.  Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ bilagah oniꞌ deꞌ pidasaꞌ odop-e.  Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ jok-e pikil oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ daang dunia itih.
pairs.target: whose end is destruction, whose god is the belly, and whose glory is in their shame, who think about earthly things.

pairs.source: Pak-e otoꞌ moꞌ jadin umat siluga.  Soꞌ kanoꞌ geh otoꞌ kajon Laja Pinyilamat otoꞌ, Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus yaꞌ nog.
pairs.target: For our citizenship is in heaven, from where we also wait for a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ;

pairs.source: Iyoh yaꞌ gati gonan otoꞌ deꞌ ponai kobos itih, jadin kodaꞌ gonan odop-E deꞌ punuaꞌ odaꞌ kuasa.  Iyoh nai wat inoh pakai kuasa-E, deꞌ odaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ tunuak duoh taat tuduꞌ odop-E.
pairs.target: who will change the body of our humiliation to be conformed to the body of his glory, according to the working by which he is able even to subject all things to himself.    Philippians

pairs.source: Madih ayua deꞌ ngibalaꞌ kuꞌ duoh deꞌ jobong kuꞌ soꞌ-e, ingan leh deꞌ odaꞌ okuꞌ doon duoh bilagah tentang ingan.  Ingan halus telus idip bonal-bonal bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Therefore, my brothers, beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand firm in the Lord, my beloved.

pairs.source: Euodia duoh Sintike, tok-tok kuꞌ mitiaꞌ-e saꞌ ingan niꞌ kila ingan dop-e ingan moꞌ samah-samah idip niꞌ duoh Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: I exhort Euodia, and I exhort Syntyche, to think the same way in the Lord.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ mitiaꞌ tuduꞌ muꞌu, Sunsugos, dingan deꞌ dapod kuꞌ bisayaꞌ daꞌ-e, saꞌ muꞌ tulung dayung deꞌ duwoh inoh.  Odop-e duwoh moꞌ ulih-ulih kiloja samah-samah duoh okuꞌ ngan-e magah Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ; samah kodaꞌ Klemen duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon deꞌ moꞌ samah-samah kiloja duoh okuꞌ.  Adon odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ ogiꞌ daang buk tentang nyaꞌa deꞌ idip nah-nah, samah kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ bokon.
pairs.target: Yes, I beg you also, true partner, help these women, for they labored with me in the Good News, with Clement also, and the rest of my fellow workers, whose names are in the book of life.

pairs.source: Ingan halus silalu doon dop-e ingan moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Topaꞌ.  Niꞌ sidoh lagiꞌ kuꞌ tanon-e doon leh!
pairs.target: Rejoice in the Lord always! Again I will say, “Rejoice!”

pairs.source: Bitanga leh tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa, otin ingan deꞌ paguh soꞌ pingunai ingan deꞌ paguh.  Diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ tuui Topaꞌ moꞌ yaꞌ nog.
pairs.target: Let your gentleness be known to all men. The Lord is at hand.

pairs.source: Maꞌ bigaduh tentang hal oni sijaꞌ-e, pak-e daang suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ jadi daang idip ingan, ingan halus bidoa duoh mitiaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ oni deꞌ pilelu ingan.  Tibilang ingan bidoa, maꞌ komut bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: In nothing be anxious, but in everything, by prayer and petition with thanksgiving, let your requests be made known to God.

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, Topaꞌ yaꞌ ngin kila deꞌ bidanah deꞌ diꞌ toꞌ tapod ngiloti-e pakai pikil manusia.  Kila deꞌ bidanah inoh leh deꞌ yaꞌ jaga kila duoh pikil ingan deꞌ moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus.
pairs.target: And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your thoughts in Christ Jesus.

pairs.source: Piobuaꞌ-e, madih ayua kuꞌ, ingan halus pikil suaꞌ ajal deꞌ bonal, suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ odaꞌ nyaꞌa pimodo tuduꞌ Topaꞌ, suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ adil, suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ nyaꞌa ponai yaꞌ nyalah-a, suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ odaꞌ nyaꞌa suka, suaꞌ sina deꞌ paguh in nyeꞌ ngojit-e, suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ guna-e duoh deꞌ patut nyaꞌa mudi-e.
pairs.target: Finally, brothers, whatever things are true, whatever things are honorable, whatever things are just, whatever things are pure, whatever things are lovely, whatever things are of good report; if there is any virtue, and if there is any praise, think about these things.

pairs.source: Nai leh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ ngajal kuꞌ tuduꞌ ingan duoh deꞌ moꞌ tilimaꞌ ingan soꞌ okuꞌ, bait deꞌ pakai sina deꞌ tanon kuꞌ, bait soꞌ pingunai kuꞌ deꞌ ningaꞌ ingan.  Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, Topaꞌ deꞌ ngin idip bidanah silalu ogiꞌ duoh ingan.
pairs.target: The things which you learned, received, heard, and saw in me: do these things, and the God of peace will be with you.

pairs.source: Topaꞌ odaꞌ okuꞌ doon, dop-e sungu otoꞌ moꞌ tuui bitogan, pak-e adin ingan moꞌ paliꞌ pikil oni wat idip okuꞌ.  Ingan tok silalu piduli duoh okuꞌ, pak-e diꞌ ingan silalu poyaꞌ tulung okuꞌ.
pairs.target: But I rejoice in the Lord greatly, that now at length you have revived your thought for me; in which you did indeed take thought, but you lacked opportunity.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ sina deꞌ in itih idoh diꞌ-e ngan kuꞌ idip sotok, dop-e okuꞌ moꞌ bilajal puas duoh oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ.
pairs.target: Not that I speak because of lack, for I have learned in whatever state I am, to be content in it.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ moꞌ kiꞌan oni nyam idip sotok, okuꞌ moꞌ kiꞌan oni nyam idip suaꞌ oniꞌ ogiꞌ lobih soꞌ deꞌ pilelu kuꞌ.  Okuꞌ moꞌ bilajal puas siniaꞌ sijaꞌ-e, bait takal okuꞌ pilai bait busuah, bait takal okuꞌ sotok bait takal suaꞌ oniꞌ ogiꞌ lobih soꞌ deꞌ pilelu kuꞌ.
pairs.target: I know how to be humbled, and I know also how to abound. In everything and in all things I have learned the secret both to be filled and to be hungry, both to abound and to be in need.

pairs.source: Kristus leh deꞌ odaꞌ okuꞌ taan lopus soꞌ oni sijaꞌ deꞌ obuah idip kuꞌ.
pairs.target: I can do all things through Christ, who strengthens me.

pairs.source: Pak-e ingan sukup paguh, dop-e ingan moꞌ tulung okuꞌ takal okuꞌ susah.
pairs.target: However you did well that you shared in my affliction.

pairs.source: Madih ayua kuꞌ, uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ Filipi, ingan tuang moꞌ puꞌan ingan geh takal okuꞌ bilakat soꞌ Makedonia ngan sibungas kuꞌ odi magah Gah deꞌ Paguh.  Takal inoh jok-e ingan uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ tulung ngin duit ngan kuꞌ nai kiloja saꞌan Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: You yourselves also know, you Philippians, that in the beginning of the Good News, when I departed from Macedonia, no assembly shared with me in the matter of giving and receiving but you only.

pairs.source: Takal okuꞌ deꞌ Tesalonika, moꞌ lobih soꞌ niꞌ sidoh ingan pait duit tuduꞌ okuꞌ ngan ingan tulung okuꞌ.
pairs.target: For even in Thessalonica you sent once and again to my need.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ in inoh, idoh diꞌ-e ngan kuꞌ odaꞌ ingan ngin duit deꞌ okuꞌ.  Pak-e deꞌ laꞌan kuꞌ, okuꞌ yaꞌ ningaꞌ Topaꞌ ngin bilokat tuduꞌ ingan dop-e ingan moꞌ tulung okuꞌ.
pairs.target: Not that I seek for the gift, but I seek for the fruit that increases to your account.

pairs.source: Adin okuꞌ moꞌ tilimaꞌ oni deꞌ ngin ingan, makin lobih soꞌ deꞌ pilelu kuꞌ.  Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ pilelu kuꞌ moꞌ toban Epafroditus.  Oniꞌ deꞌ ngin ingan inoh, samah kodaꞌ persembahan korban deꞌ masog puat-e tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.  Topaꞌ moꞌ suka-e duoh Iyoh sonang ngan-e tilimaꞌ-e.
pairs.target: But I have all things, and abound. I am filled, having received from Epaphroditus the things that came from you, a sweet-smelling fragrance, an acceptable and well-pleasing sacrifice to God.

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, Topaꞌ kuꞌ deꞌ kaya laya duoh deꞌ ayuh kuasa-E yaꞌ ngin suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ pilelu ingan pakai Kristus Yesus.
pairs.target: My God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.

pairs.source: Obuah mudi leh Topaꞌ Samaꞌ otoꞌ nah-nah! Amin.
pairs.target: Now to our God and Father be the glory forever and ever! Amen.

pairs.source: Ngin salam kuꞌ tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ Topaꞌ, deꞌ moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus.  Ogiꞌ geh salam soꞌ madih ayua deꞌ samah-samah bisayaꞌ, deꞌ ogiꞌ samah-samah duoh okuꞌ datiꞌ.
pairs.target: Greet every saint in Christ Jesus. The brothers who are with me greet you.

pairs.source: Salam saꞌan ingan soꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ Topaꞌ, amot-e soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ ogiꞌ deꞌ istana laja Roma.
pairs.target: All the saints greet you, especially those who are of Caesar’s household.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus ngin bilokat tuduꞌ ingan.  Salam soꞌ koꞌih duwoh, Paulus duoh Timotius     KOLOSE
pairs.target: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.    Colossians

pairs.source: Salam soꞌ okuꞌ, Paulus, nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ obuah pilih jadin rasul Kristus Yesus, nunaꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ.   Salam geh soꞌ Timotius deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus samah kodaꞌ otoꞌ.
pairs.target: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, and Timothy our brother,

pairs.source: Koꞌih nulis sulat itih tuduꞌ ingan madih ayua deꞌ Kolose, deꞌ jok-e Topaꞌ deꞌ kakuꞌ duoh deꞌ totap bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.   Koꞌih bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ ngin bilokat duoh idip bidanah tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: to the saints and faithful brothers in Christ at Colossae: Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.
We give thanks to God the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,

pairs.source: Koꞌih moꞌ ngojit nang ingan bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus Kristus duoh ngibalaꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ Topaꞌ, noh leh ngan takal koꞌih bidoa saꞌan ingan, koꞌih mala bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ, Samaꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ otoꞌ Yesus Kristus.
pairs.target: having heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which you have toward all the saints,

pairs.source: Ingan bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus duoh ngibalaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ Topaꞌ, dop-e ingan bialap tuduꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ nyidia Topaꞌ saꞌan ingan daang siluga.   Ingan moꞌ ngojit tentang suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ alap ingan inoh takal Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ deꞌ bonal obuah tanon tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: because of the hope which is laid up for you in the heavens, of which you heard before in the word of the truth of the Good News,

pairs.source: Gah deꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ inoh moꞌ popah tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ daang dunia, yohmoꞌ idip nyaꞌa obuah bilokat odaꞌ gah inoh.   Samah kodaꞌ ingan obuah bilokat soꞌ takal ingan ngojit tentang pilasiꞌ Topaꞌ, ingan moꞌ bonal-bonal nunaꞌ-e.
pairs.target: which has come to you; even as it is in all the world and is bearing fruit and growing, as it does in you also, since the day you heard and knew the grace of God in truth;

pairs.source: Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ ingan puꞌan soꞌ Epafras.   Iyoh inoh dingan koꞌih, deꞌ sukup koꞌih ngibalaꞌ-e, deꞌ samah-samah jadin ulun duoh koꞌih.   Iyoh pilayan Kristus deꞌ totap telus nai kiloja Topaꞌ saꞌan ingan.
pairs.target: even as you learned of Epaphras our beloved fellow servant, who is a faithful servant of Christ on our behalf,

pairs.source: Soꞌ iyoh leh koꞌih ngojit nang pakai kuasa deꞌ soꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ, ingan tapod samah oni ngibalaꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: who also declared to us your love in the Spirit.

pairs.source: Soꞌ takal koꞌih ngojit gah tentang ingan inoh leh koꞌih mala bidoa saꞌan ingan.   Koꞌih mitiaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ saꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ ngin bijak ponai tuduꞌ ingan duoh odaꞌ ingan puꞌan sipunuaꞌ-e oni deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: For this cause, we also, since the day we heard this, don’t cease praying and making requests for you, that you may be filled with the knowledge of his will in all spiritual wisdom and understanding,

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, ingan dapod idip nunaꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ, duoh silalu nyonang otin-E, saꞌ-e daang suaꞌ pingunai ingan ogiꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ paguh nog soꞌ-o.   Ingan moꞌ makin bitamah-tamah piluh tentang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: that you may walk worthily of the Lord, to please him in all respects, bearing fruit in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;

pairs.source: Koꞌih bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ ngin kuasa deꞌ ayuh odaꞌ ingan dolas saꞌ ingan taan naan susah jolaꞌ deꞌ obuah ingan pakai kila deꞌ sabal duoh diꞌ nyeꞌ mulah yaꞌ nyelah,
pairs.target: strengthened with all power, according to the might of his glory, for all endurance and perseverance with joy;

pairs.source: duoh bisukul daang kila deꞌ doon tuduꞌ Samaꞌ, dop-e Iyoh inoh leh Samaꞌ deꞌ odaꞌ ingan patut soꞌon oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ nyidia Topaꞌ saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ-E daang pilitah-E deꞌ jawaꞌ.
pairs.target: giving thanks to the Father, who made us fit to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light;

pairs.source: Iyoh moꞌ pilopas otoꞌ soꞌ kuasa deꞌ jaꞌat yohmoꞌ alih otoꞌ odaꞌ jadin nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ Onak-E deꞌ ngibalaꞌ-E, Laja otoꞌ.
pairs.target: who delivered us out of the power of darkness, and translated us into the Kingdom of the Son of his love;

pairs.source: Onak-E inoh leh deꞌ moꞌ nubuas pilopas otoꞌ, loti-e dosa-dosa otoꞌ moꞌ obuah ngapun.
pairs.target: in whom we have our redemption, the forgiveness of our sins;

pairs.source: Topaꞌ idoh diꞌ toꞌ kilin-E, pak-e otoꞌ kilin Onak-E deꞌ pinuan, asal otoꞌ kilin Onak pinuan-E, loti-e otoꞌ moꞌ kilin Topaꞌ.   Onak pinuan-E inohleh deꞌ militah suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of all creation.

pairs.source: Dop-e pakai Iyoh leh Topaꞌ nai suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ deꞌ siluga duoh deꞌ dunia, suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ tonga duoh deꞌ diꞌ-e tonga, wat inoh geh suaꞌ gamut deꞌ ogiꞌ kuasa duoh deꞌ militah.   Topaꞌ nai suaꞌ oniꞌ pakai Kristus saꞌan Kristus.
pairs.target: For by him all things were created, in the heavens and on the earth, things visible and things invisible, whether thrones or dominions or principalities or powers; all things have been created through him, and for him.

pairs.source: Iyoh moꞌ dioꞌ ogiꞌ soꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ, duoh Iyoh leh deꞌ odaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ masim-masim ogiꞌ deꞌ topat-e.
pairs.target: He is before all things, and in him all things are held together.

pairs.source: Kristus leh deꞌ jadin bak saꞌan uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ, deꞌ jadin gonan-E.   Iyoh leh deꞌ sibungas-e jadin puꞌun, deꞌ pinuan, deꞌ sibungas-e paliꞌ idip soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kobos, saꞌ Iyoh sadiꞌ-E deꞌ jadin paling penting soꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ.
pairs.target: He is the head of the body, the assembly, who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.

pairs.source: Dop-e Topaꞌ sonang otin-E odaꞌ odop-E bonal-bonal ogiꞌ sipunuaꞌ-e daang Kristus.
pairs.target: For all the fullness was pleased to dwell in him;

pairs.source: Ngan Onak-E inoh leh Topaꞌ moꞌ notap odaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ bidamai duoh odop-E, bait duoh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ dunia, bait duoh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ siluga pakai doyaꞌ Kristus deꞌ salip.
pairs.target: and through him to reconcile all things to himself, by him, whether things on the earth, or things in the heavens, having made peace through the blood of his cross.

pairs.source: Deꞌ dioꞌ ingan idip juuaꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ.   Ingan bitomi duoh-E, dop-e pikil duoh oniꞌ deꞌ nai ingan jaꞌat.
pairs.target: You, being in past times alienated and enemies in your mind in your evil deeds,

pairs.source: Pak-e adin ngan pingobos Onak-E deꞌ moꞌ jadin manusia, Topaꞌ paliꞌ bidamai duoh ingan.   Wat inoh leh wat-e ngan-E odaꞌ ingan bisig soꞌ dosa duoh doiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ dapod yaꞌ nyalah ingan deꞌ sulung jowin-E.
pairs.target: yet now he has reconciled in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and without defect and blameless before him,

pairs.source: Pak-e ingan halus totap bisayaꞌ, togap daang bisayaꞌ-e, diꞌ-e tiligian soꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ alap ingan, deꞌ ngin-E takal ingan tilimaꞌ Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ.   Gah inoh moꞌ obuah magah tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa daang dunia.   Okuꞌ, Paulus, moꞌ jadin kuli tukang magah Gah deꞌ Paguh inoh.
pairs.target: if it is so that you continue in the faith, grounded and steadfast, and not moved away from the hope of the Good News which you heard, which is being proclaimed in all creation under heaven; of which I, Paul, was made a servant.

pairs.source: Adin okuꞌ sonang ngan kuꞌ susah jolaꞌ, dop-e susah jolaꞌ deꞌ obuah okuꞌ ngan kuꞌ tulung ingan.   Susah jolaꞌ deꞌ ngoon gonan kuꞌ ngan okuꞌ nyukup susah jolaꞌ deꞌ ngoon Kristus saꞌan uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ jadin gonan Kristus.
pairs.target: Now I rejoice in my sufferings for your sake, and fill up on my part that which is lacking of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body’s sake, which is the assembly;

pairs.source: Topaꞌ moꞌ odaꞌ okuꞌ nai kiloja jadin pilayan saꞌan uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.   Okuꞌ halus tanon suaꞌ Pingunang Topaꞌ tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: of which I was made a servant, according to the stewardship of God which was given me toward you, to fulfill the word of God,

pairs.source: Deꞌ tian-tian itih soꞌ joman keꞌ joman, soꞌ sumuk babai nog onak sukun aluaꞌ diꞌ nyaꞌa puꞌan-e, pak-e adin Iyoh moꞌ bitanga tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ-E.
pairs.target: the mystery which has been hidden for ages and generations. But now it has been revealed to his saints,

pairs.source: Topaꞌ bitanga oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ saꞌ-a puꞌan nang bilokat duoh kuasa soꞌ Kristus deꞌ sukup-sukup ayuh-e obuah ngin geh tuduꞌ ingan deꞌ soꞌ bangsa-bangsa deꞌ bokon.   Oniꞌ deꞌ tanon Topaꞌ inoh yohleh tentang Kristus ogiꞌ daang ingan, loti-e Kristus deꞌ jamen saꞌ ingan suwaꞌ ngoon kuasa-E deꞌ ayuh.
pairs.target: to whom God was pleased to make known what are the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory;

pairs.source: Kristus inoh leh deꞌ magah koꞌih tuduꞌ ingan, suaꞌ nyaꞌa koꞌih sibaya-e, koꞌih ngajal-e pakai bijak ponai, saꞌ koꞌih dapod toban nyaꞌa keꞌ sulung jowin Topaꞌ jadin nyaꞌa deꞌ tuꞌuh daang bisayaꞌ-e, dop-e nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus.
pairs.target: whom we proclaim, admonishing every man and teaching every man in all wisdom, that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus;

pairs.source: Yoh ngan kuꞌ kiloja ulih-ulih pakai suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ mapu okuꞌ nai-e deꞌ moꞌ ngin Kristus tuduꞌ okuꞌ.   Iyoh inoh leh deꞌ kiloja pakai punuaꞌ kuasa daang okuꞌ.
pairs.target: for which I also labor, striving according to his working, which works in me mightily.    Colossians

pairs.source: Okuꞌ odaꞌ ingan puꞌan-e, okuꞌ kiloja ulih-ulih saꞌan ingan duoh saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ Laodikia, baya suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ aluaꞌ diꞌ-e bitapod duoh okuꞌ.
pairs.target: For I desire to have you know how greatly I struggle for you, and for those at Laodicea, and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;

pairs.source: Okuꞌ nai deꞌ wat inoh saꞌ otin odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ obuah ngilibul duoh samah-samah ngibalaꞌ, saꞌ-e idip tikuluk jadin niꞌ.   Moꞌ-e moꞌ wat inoh, odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ bonal-bonal ngiloti duoh bisayaꞌ baya puꞌan oni deꞌ yaꞌ nai Topaꞌ deꞌ aluaꞌ diꞌ nyaꞌa puꞌan-e, yohleh tentang Kristus.
pairs.target: that their hearts may be comforted, they being knit together in love, and gaining all riches of the full assurance of understanding, that they may know the mystery of God, both of the Father and of Christ,

pairs.source: Dop-e Topaꞌ moꞌ nyikon suaꞌ halta bijak ponai jok-e daang Kristus, saꞌ otoꞌ dapod puꞌan tentang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: in whom are all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge hidden.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ tanon oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ tiꞌ-e tuduꞌ ingan saꞌ diꞌ ingan obuah nipu odaꞌ osi sijaꞌ-e deꞌ maꞌ in-e ponai nang oniꞌ odaꞌ in deꞌ bonal in-e.
pairs.target: Now this I say that no one may delude you with persuasiveness of speech.

pairs.source: Dop-e bial-e okuꞌ doiꞌ deꞌ uluk ingan, pak-e kila kuꞌ ogiꞌ samah-samah duoh ingan.   Okuꞌ doon ningaꞌ idip ingan deꞌ tiatul duoh totap togap bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: For though I am absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit, rejoicing and seeing your order, and the steadfastness of your faith in Christ.

pairs.source: Adin ingan moꞌ tilimaꞌ Kristus Yesus jadin Topaꞌ ingan, ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh ingan halus totap idip niꞌ duoh Iyoh.
pairs.target: As therefore you received Christ Jesus, the Lord, walk in him,

pairs.source: Ingan halus bisayaꞌ togap tuduꞌ Iyoh, samah kodaꞌ aat tongon koyuh deꞌ tumuꞌ tuluap kaang tanaꞌ.   Ingan halus bialap jok-e tuduꞌ Iyoh, kodaꞌ boli deꞌ kajuag nyaꞌa deꞌ tun tuguꞌ deꞌ togap.   Yohmoꞌ ingan halus bisayaꞌ lobih togap lagiꞌ tuduꞌ Iyoh, nunaꞌ suaꞌ ajal deꞌ moꞌ tilimaꞌ ingan.   Ingan halus telus bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: rooted and built up in him, and established in the faith, even as you were taught, abounding in it in thanksgiving.

pairs.source: Ati-ati duoh sina pibulaꞌ deꞌ nang nyaꞌa, maꞌ yaꞌ pogo tuduꞌ sina deꞌ munoꞌ deꞌ doiꞌ guna-e duoh deꞌ odaꞌ nyaꞌa moyap soꞌ olan deꞌ bonal.   Pingunang deꞌ munoꞌ idoh diꞌ-e soꞌ Kristus pak-e soꞌ buaꞌ pikil manusia soꞌ joman keꞌ joman duoh soꞌ gamut-gamut deꞌ nguasa dunia.
pairs.target: Be careful that you don’t let anyone rob you through his philosophy and vain deceit, after the tradition of men, after the elements of the world, and not after Christ.

pairs.source: Dop-e Kristus inoh sipunuaꞌ-E Topaꞌ, deꞌ moꞌ jadin manusia.
pairs.target: For in him all the fullness of the Deity dwells bodily,

pairs.source: Ngan ingan moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus, ingan soꞌon idip sipunuaꞌ-e.   Kristus deꞌ jadin bak soꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ kuasa-e duoh soꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ militah.
pairs.target: and in him you are made full, who is the head of all principality and power;

pairs.source: Dop-e ingan moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus, ingan moꞌ kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ obuah bisunat, idoh diꞌ-e bisunat deꞌ nai manusia, pak-e bisunat deꞌ nai Kristus.   Bisunat deꞌ nai Kristus inoh loti-e Kristus pilopas otoꞌ soꞌ idip deꞌ dioꞌ deꞌ bidosa.
pairs.target: in whom you were also circumcised with a circumcision not made with hands, in the putting off of the body of the sins of the flesh, in the circumcision of Christ;

pairs.source: Dop-e takal ingan obuah baptis, idip ingan deꞌ dioꞌ punuaꞌ odaꞌ dosa moꞌ obuah ngubul samah-samah duoh Kristus.   Takal Kristus paliꞌ idip, ingan tuang suwaꞌ geh samah-samah paliꞌ obuah kidip duoh Kristus, idip ingan moꞌ jadin baꞌuh.   Oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ jadin wat inoh dop-e ingan bisayaꞌ deꞌ kuasa Topaꞌ deꞌ odaꞌ Yesus paliꞌ idip soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ kobos.
pairs.target: having been buried with him in baptism, in which you were also raised with him through faith in the working of God, who raised him from the dead.

pairs.source: Wat noh geh duoh ingan, noꞌuh-e ingan moꞌ juuaꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ dop-e ingan moꞌ bidosa duoh diꞌ ingan bisunat gonan ingan.   Pak-e adin Topaꞌ paliꞌ kidip ingan samah-samah duoh Kristus.   Topaꞌ moꞌ ngapun suaꞌ dosa otoꞌ,
pairs.target: You were dead through your trespasses and the uncircumcision of your flesh. He made you alive together with him, having forgiven us all our trespasses,

pairs.source: kodaꞌ nyaꞌa ngisuꞌ tang deꞌ nulis-e, deꞌ ponai odaꞌ nyaꞌa inoh yaꞌ obuah ukum deꞌ baat.   Yesus moꞌ kobos deꞌ tun salip, ngan-e ngisuꞌ tang dosa otoꞌ.
pairs.target: wiping out the handwriting in ordinances which was against us; and he has taken it out of the way, nailing it to the cross;

pairs.source: Deꞌ tun salip inoh, Kristus odaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ kuasa-e duoh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ militah jadin doiꞌ kuasa-e.   Kristus odaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ obuah pidasaꞌ takal Kristus monang.
pairs.target: having stripped the principalities and the powers, he made a show of them openly, triumphing over them in it.

pairs.source: Noh leh ngan nyeꞌ maꞌ yaꞌ tanah odaꞌ nyaꞌa nyalah tentang oniꞌ deꞌ man, deꞌ nuak ingan.   Maꞌ yaꞌ tanah odaꞌ nyaꞌa nyalah ingan tentang onu-onu ayuh, onu ayuh puꞌun bulan, atou onu Sabat agama Yahudi.
pairs.target: Let no one therefore judge you in eating, or in drinking, or with respect to a feast day or a new moon or a Sabbath day,

pairs.source: Atulan deꞌ munoꞌ madas kodaꞌ sibamia soꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ tok deꞌ halus jadi.   Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ jadi daang odop Kristus.
pairs.target: which are a shadow of the things to come; but the body is Christ’s.

pairs.source: Maꞌ ingan yaꞌ tanah odaꞌ nyaꞌa pilugi ingan pakai pulaꞌ-pulaꞌ pidouꞌ odop-e duoh nyomah malaikat-malaikat.   Nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ samuh jok-e pikil oniꞌ deꞌ dunia.   Nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ bilagah odop-e ponai kilin oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon ponai kilin-e.
pairs.target: Let no one rob you of your prize by a voluntary humility and worshiping of the angels, dwelling in the things which he has not seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,

pairs.source: Nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ idoh tiyaꞌ diꞌ-e bikagong tuduꞌ Kristus deꞌ jadin bak.   Kodaꞌ bak deꞌ mipin gonan-e deꞌ obuah piala duoh bijamit odaꞌ aat-aat-e baya bukun-bukun tulang-e jadin makin ayuh, wat inoh geh Kristus mipin suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ jadin gonan-E makin ayuh nunaꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: and not holding firmly to the Head, from whom all the body, being supplied and knit together through the joints and ligaments, grows with God’s growth.

pairs.source: Ingan moꞌ kobos samah-samah duoh Kristus, ingan moꞌ obuah pilopas soꞌ suaꞌ gamut deꞌ nguasa dunia itih.   Adin oni nai ingan idip kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ aluaꞌ tunuak duoh atulan-atulan dunia deꞌ in-e:
pairs.target: If you died with Christ from the elements of the world, why, as though living in the world, do you subject yourselves to ordinances,

pairs.source: “Maꞌ kagong itih inoh”, “Maꞌ kiꞌan itih inoh”, “Maꞌ tomaꞌ itih inoh.   ”?
pairs.target: “Don’t handle, nor taste, nor touch”

pairs.source: Suaꞌ atulan deꞌ munoꞌ tentang oniꞌ deꞌ mokuaꞌ nyeꞌ pakai-e, diꞌ nyeꞌ tiyaꞌ ponai yaꞌ pakai-e.   Inoh jok-e atulan-atulan duoh oniꞌ deꞌ ngajal manusia.
pairs.target: (all of which perish with use), according to the precepts and doctrines of men?

pairs.source: Atulan-atulan deꞌ nai nyaꞌa deꞌ mutiꞌ mun oniꞌ deꞌ bijak ponai mun-e, pak-e inoh madas agama deꞌ nai odop manusia ngan-e nyiksa odop-e duoh odaꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ odaꞌ odop-e mun deꞌ diꞌ-e samuh mun-e.   Pak-e sibonal-e, suaꞌ atulan deꞌ munoꞌ doiꞌ guna-e, madas ngan-e kanuas odop-e nunaꞌ oni deꞌ laꞌan polong-e.
pairs.target: Which things indeed appear like wisdom in self-imposed worship, and humility, and severity to the body; but aren’t of any value against the indulgence of the flesh.    Colossians

pairs.source: Topaꞌ moꞌ odaꞌ ingan paliꞌ idip samah-samah duoh Kristus.   Inohleh ngan ingan halus kagaꞌ yaꞌ soꞌon suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ siluga, topat soꞌ Kristus militah samah-samah duoh Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: If then you were raised together with Christ, seek the things that are above, where Christ is, seated on the right hand of God.

pairs.source: Ingan sipatut-e pikil suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ daang siluga, maꞌ yaꞌ jok nyeꞌ pikil oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ daang dunia.
pairs.target: Set your mind on the things that are above, not on the things that are on the earth.

pairs.source: Dop-e idip ingan deꞌ oma moꞌ kobos, yohmoꞌ idip ingan deꞌ baꞌuh duoh Kristus moꞌ obuah nyikon odaꞌ Topaꞌ sa'an ingan.
pairs.target: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

pairs.source: Takal Kristus deꞌ jadin puꞌun pingidip otoꞌ moꞌ paliꞌ nog, ingan tuang suwaꞌ geh samah-samah duoh Iyoh daang jawaꞌ deꞌ telang.
pairs.target: When Christ, our life, is revealed, then you will also be revealed with him in glory.

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, ngabos leh suaꞌ niat dunia deꞌ jaꞌat deꞌ ogiꞌ daang kila ingan, kodaꞌ ngaso nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e lawang odop-e, nai oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e sinunuh, oniꞌ deꞌ nai-e kodaꞌ binatang, niat deꞌ jaꞌat, duoh pinganguak samah kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ nyomah tipaduaꞌ.
pairs.target: Put to death therefore your members which are on the earth: sexual immorality, uncleanness, depraved passion, evil desire, and covetousness, which is idolatry;

pairs.source: Luban oniꞌ deꞌ wat inoh leh Topaꞌ yaꞌ ulih-ulih tiwas tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e nunaꞌ pingunang-E.
pairs.target: for which things’ sake the wrath of God comes on the children of disobedience.

pairs.source: Deꞌ dioꞌ ingan tuang nai ingan geh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ, takal idip ingan obuah nguasa odaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ.
pairs.target: You also once walked in those, when you lived in them;

pairs.source: Pak-e adin ingan halus tolan suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ jaꞌat itih: malah, tiwas deꞌ nyaꞌa, buꞌui deꞌ nyaꞌa, pijaꞌat nyaꞌa duoh nang sina bigunyak.
pairs.target: but now you also put them all away: anger, wrath, malice, slander, and shameful speaking out of your mouth.

pairs.source: Maꞌ tiyaꞌ ingan yaꞌ mogo siodop ingan, dop-e idip ingan deꞌ oma duoh pingunai ingan deꞌ oma, ingan moꞌ kadi-e duoh tolan-e.
pairs.target: Don’t lie to one another, seeing that you have put off the old man with his doings,

pairs.source: Adin ingan moꞌ pakai idip deꞌ baꞌuh.   Idip ingan deꞌ baꞌuh inoh telus sijaꞌ-a obuah ngubah jadin samah kodaꞌ Topaꞌ.   Topaꞌ nai wat inoh saꞌ ingan ponai piluh Topaꞌ sipunuaꞌ-e.
pairs.target: and have put on the new man, who is being renewed in knowledge after the image of his Creator,

pairs.source: Daang idip deꞌ baꞌuh itih, doiꞌ tiyaꞌ deꞌ nang nyeꞌ ulang Yunani atou ulang Yahudi, nyaꞌa deꞌ bisunat atou nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e bisunat, nyaꞌa deꞌ ogiꞌ adat-e atou nyaꞌa deꞌ doiꞌ adat-e, ulun atou diꞌ-e ulun, dop-e Kristus leh deꞌ paling penting-e soꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ.   Iyoh moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ!
pairs.target: where there can’t be Greek and Jew, circumcision and uncircumcision, barbarian, Scythian, bondservant, freeman; but Christ is all, and in all.

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, ingan moꞌ jadin nyaꞌa deꞌ jok-e Topaꞌ deꞌ kakuꞌ duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ ngibalaꞌ-E.   Inoh leh ngan ingan halus bitanga pilasiꞌ, paguh otin, pidouꞌ odop nyeꞌ, piduli duoh kila nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon, duoh taan naan idip jolaꞌ.
pairs.target: Put on therefore, as God’s chosen ones, holy and beloved, a heart of compassion, kindness, lowliness, humility, and perseverance;

pairs.source: Ingan halus sabal duoh siodop ingan.   Ingan halus ngapun nyaꞌa deꞌ nai salah duoh ingan.   Samah kodaꞌ Topaꞌ moꞌ ngapun ingan, ingan halus wat noh geh.
pairs.target: bearing with one another, and forgiving each other, if any man has a complaint against any; even as Christ forgave you, so you also do.

pairs.source: Yohmoꞌ deꞌ paling penting soꞌ suaꞌ-e deꞌ mutiꞌ, ingan halus bitanga nang ingan ngibalaꞌ siodop ingan deꞌ moꞌ odaꞌ ingan bonal-bonal idip tikuluk jadin niꞌ.
pairs.target: Above all these things, walk in love, which is the bond of perfection.

pairs.source: Tanah saꞌ idip bidanah deꞌ soꞌ Kristus militah daang otin ingan.   Dop-e Topaꞌ mogan ingan odaꞌ niꞌ gonan saꞌ ingan idip bidanah.   Wat inoh geh Ingan halus bisukul tuduꞌ-E.
pairs.target: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to which also you were called in one body; and be thankful.

pairs.source: Odaꞌ leh pingunang Kristus totap ogiꞌ sipunuaꞌ daang kila ingan, saꞌ ingan pakai suaꞌ bijak ponai ngan ingan ngajal duoh ngalah siodop ingan.   Nai leh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ simadi nyeꞌ bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ daang otin ingan pakai ngilagu lagu soꞌ Mazmur, soꞌ buk lagu, duoh pakai lagu soꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly; in all wisdom teaching and admonishing one another with psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your heart to the Lord.

pairs.source: Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai duoh deꞌ nang ingan, nai leh suaꞌ-e deꞌ munoꞌ pakai adon Topaꞌ Yesus.   Bisukul leh tuduꞌ Topaꞌ, Samaꞌ otoꞌ saꞌan oni deꞌ moꞌ nai Yesus saꞌan otoꞌ.
pairs.target: Whatever you do, in word or in deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father, through him.

pairs.source: Oi ingan bala sowon, tunuak leh tuduꞌ bonon ingan, nunaꞌ wat deꞌ patut ingan deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ nai-e.
pairs.target: Wives, be in subjection to your husbands, as is fitting in the Lord.

pairs.source: Oi ingan bala bonon, ngibalaꞌ leh sowon ingan, maꞌ yaꞌ gaus duoh-e.
pairs.target: Husbands, love your wives, and don’t be bitter against them.

pairs.source: Oi ingan deꞌ jadin onak, daang suaꞌ oniꞌ, nunaꞌ leh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ngajal pingoma ingan tuduꞌ ingan, dop-e oniꞌ deꞌ wat inoh leh deꞌ odaꞌ otin Topaꞌ sonang.
pairs.target: Children, obey your parents in all things, for this pleases the Lord.

pairs.source: Oi ingan bala samaꞌ, maꞌ yaꞌ kanam kila onak opot ingan odaꞌ yoh bonguak, jak-e pikil nang suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai-e salah.
pairs.target: Fathers, don’t provoke your children, so that they won’t be discouraged.

pairs.source: Oi ingan deꞌ bala ulun, daang suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai ingan, taat leh tuduꞌ tuan ingan daang dunia itih, maꞌ yaꞌ jok-e deꞌ sulung jowin-e sijaꞌ-e ngan nyeꞌ yaꞌ odaꞌ kila-e sonang, pak-e nai negeh suaꞌ oniꞌ pakai otin deꞌ bisig dop-e ingan pimodo deꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Servants, obey in all things those who are your masters according to the flesh, not just when they are looking, as men pleasers, but in singleness of heart, fearing God.

pairs.source: Oni sijaꞌ-e deꞌ nai ingan, nai negeh ngan suaꞌ otin ingan kodaꞌ ingan nai saꞌan Topaꞌ, idoh diꞌ-e saꞌan manusia.
pairs.target: And whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord, and not for men,

pairs.source: Natong nyeꞌ, ingan yaꞌ soꞌon upah soꞌ Topaꞌ.   Oni deꞌ moꞌ sidia Topaꞌ saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ, inoh leh deꞌ yaꞌ ngin-E tuduꞌ ingan.   Dop-e toke deꞌ sibonal-e deꞌ obuah layan odaꞌ ingan, yohleh Kristus.
pairs.target: knowing that from the Lord you will receive the reward of the inheritance; for you serve the Lord Christ.

pairs.source: Osi sijaꞌ-e deꞌ nai salah-e, iyoh yaꞌ obuah ngukum luban salah-e inoh, dop-e Topaꞌ diꞌ-e pilih-pilih nyaꞌa takal-E ngukum-e.
pairs.target: But he who does wrong will receive again for the wrong that he has done, and there is no partiality.    Colossians

pairs.source: Oi ingan bala toke, maꞌ yaꞌ diꞌ nyeꞌ adil duoh diꞌ nyeꞌ jujul tuduꞌ kuli ingan.   Natong nyeꞌ ingan tuang ogiꞌ geh toke ingan deꞌ siluga.
pairs.target: Masters, give to your servants that which is just and equal, knowing that you also have a Master in heaven.

pairs.source: Maꞌ buwon-buwon bidoa duoh silalu jaga-jaga, simadi nyeꞌ bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Continue steadfastly in prayer, watching therein with thanksgiving;

pairs.source: Bidoa geh saꞌan koꞌih, saꞌ Topaꞌ bukaꞌ olan ngan koꞌih magah gah deꞌ aluaꞌ diꞌ nyaꞌa puꞌan-e soꞌ Topaꞌ tentang Kristus.   Inoh leh deꞌ odaꞌ okuꞌ obuah jel adin.
pairs.target: praying together for us also, that God may open to us a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds;

pairs.source: Bidoa leh saꞌ okuꞌ dapod nelang gah inoh saꞌ nyaꞌa dapod ngiloti-e, kodaꞌ deꞌ halus okuꞌ nai-e.
pairs.target: that I may reveal it as I ought to speak.

pairs.source: Idip nyeꞌ halus bijak tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ aluaꞌ diꞌ-e bisayaꞌ.   Pakai leh suaꞌ onu deꞌ ogiꞌ ngan nyeꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ paguh.
pairs.target: Walk in wisdom toward those who are outside, redeeming the time.

pairs.source: Nang leh pingunang deꞌ silalu punuaꞌ pilasiꞌ duoh deꞌ paguh in nyaꞌa ngojit-e, saꞌ nyaꞌa dapod tilimaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nang ingan.   Ingan halus puꞌan oni in ingan yaꞌ nyawot tibilang oniꞌ deꞌ sikian nyaꞌa.
pairs.target: Let your speech always be with grace, seasoned with salt, that you may know how you ought to answer each one.

pairs.source: Tikhikus, madih deꞌ obuah ngibalaꞌ odaꞌ otoꞌ yaꞌ tanon tuduꞌ ingan suaꞌ oniꞌ tentang okuꞌ.   Tikhikus itih nyaꞌa deꞌ doiꞌ sidoh-e loꞌo ngan-e nai kiloja saꞌan Topaꞌ samah-samah duoh koꞌih.
pairs.target: All my affairs will be made known to you by Tychicus, the beloved brother, faithful servant, and fellow bondservant in the Lord.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ pait iyoh tuduꞌ ingan saꞌ ingan puꞌan geh gah soꞌ koꞌih, oni deꞌ moꞌ ngoon koꞌih duoh saꞌ iyoh ngilibul kila ingan.
pairs.target: I am sending him to you for this very purpose, that he may know your circumstances and comfort your hearts,

pairs.source: Okuꞌ odaꞌ odop-e duwoh Onesimus, deꞌ soꞌ uluk odop ingan, madih otoꞌ deꞌ totap ngibalaꞌ koꞌih duoh deꞌ obuah ngibalaꞌ odaꞌ koꞌih.   Odop-e deꞌ duwoh yaꞌ tanon tuduꞌ ingan suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ jadi datiꞌ.
pairs.target: together with Onesimus, the faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They will make known to you everything that is going on here.

pairs.source: Aristarkhus deꞌ ogiꞌ daang jel samah-samah duoh okuꞌ, pait salam tuduꞌ ingan, wat noh geh Markus, madih sepupu Barnabas.   Ingan moꞌ obuah sibaya sodiꞌ-e, simoꞌ Markus nog tuduꞌ ingan, ingan nyamut-e.
pairs.target: Aristarchus, my fellow prisoner, greets you, and Mark, the cousin of Barnabas (concerning whom you received commandments, “if he comes to you, receive him”),

pairs.source: Salam geh soꞌ Yesus deꞌ adon-e geh Yustus.   Jok-e odop-e deꞌ taluh inoh deꞌ ulang Yahudi deꞌ jadin dingan kuꞌ deꞌ nai kiloja samah-samah duoh okuꞌ ngan-e odaꞌ nyaꞌa bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.   Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ leh deꞌ tulung ngilibul kila kuꞌ.
pairs.target: and Jesus who is called Justus. These are my only fellow workers for God’s Kingdom who are of the circumcision, men who have been a comfort to me.

pairs.source: Salam soꞌ Epafras.   Iyoh itih soꞌ uluk odop ingan, iyoh kuli Kristus Yesus deꞌ silalu tutug bidoa saꞌan ingan.   Iyoh ulih-ulih mitiaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ saꞌ ingan bonal-bonal togap bisayaꞌ, jadin nyaꞌa deꞌ tuꞌuh, saꞌ ingan bisayaꞌ punuaꞌ ngan ingan nai suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ, salutes you, always striving for you in his prayers, that you may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.

pairs.source: Odop kuꞌ deꞌ moꞌ ningaꞌ nang iyoh moꞌ ulih-ulih kiloja saꞌan ingan, saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ Laodikia duoh Hierapolis.
pairs.target: For I testify about him, that he has great zeal for you, and for those in Laodicea, and for those in Hierapolis.

pairs.source: Salam soꞌ Dokter Lukas deꞌ obuah ngibalaꞌ odaꞌ otoꞌ duoh salam soꞌ Demas saꞌan ingan.
pairs.target: Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas greet you.

pairs.source: Tanon salam soꞌ koꞌih tuduꞌ madih ayua deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus deꞌ Laodikia, tanon geh salam koꞌih tuduꞌ Nimfa duoh uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus deꞌ mala tikuluk simayang deꞌ boli-e.
pairs.target: Greet the brothers who are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the assembly that is in his house.

pairs.source: Takal sulat itih moꞌ obuah basa daang uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ Kolose, ingan halus pait sulat itih tuduꞌ uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ Laodikia saꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ basa-e.   Wat inoh geh ingan halus basa sulat soꞌ okuꞌ deꞌ obuah pait tuduꞌ uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ Laodikia deꞌ pait-e tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: When this letter has been read among you, cause it to be read also in the assembly of the Laodiceans; and that you also read the letter from Laodicea.

pairs.source: Nyeꞌ moꞌ tanon geh tuduꞌ Arkhipus, “Pijadi leh tugas deꞌ moꞌ obuah ngin tuduꞌ muꞌu ngan nyeꞌ layan Topaꞌ.   ”
pairs.target: Tell Archippus, “Take heed to the ministry which you have received in the Lord, that you fulfill it.”

pairs.source: Salam soꞌ okuꞌ, Paulus.   Tongan odop kuꞌ deꞌ nulis salam itih.   Maꞌ komut nang okuꞌ daang jel.   Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Yesus ngin bilokat tuduꞌ ingan.   Salam soꞌ koꞌih, Paulus duoh Timotius      TESALONIKA
pairs.target: The salutation of me, Paul, with my own hand: remember my bonds. Grace be with you. Amen.

pairs.source: Salam soꞌ koꞌih taluh, Paulus, Timotius duoh Silas, tuduꞌ uluk ulang bisayaꞌ deꞌ Tesalonika deꞌ kakuꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ duoh deꞌ kakuꞌ Yesus Kristus Topaꞌ.   Koꞌih bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ otoꞌ duoh Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus ngin bilokat duoh idip bidanah tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy, to the assembly of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

pairs.source: – Koꞌih silalu bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ saꞌan suaꞌ ingan.   Tibilang koꞌih bidoa tuduꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ, koꞌih bidoa saꞌan ingan.   Ingan nai pingunai kiloja deꞌ paguh dop-e ingan bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.   Ingan kiloja ngan ingan tulung nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon dop-e ingan ngibalaꞌ odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ duoh ngibalaꞌ Topaꞌ.   Ingan totap telus nogap otin ingan dop-e ingan bialap punuaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus Yesus Topaꞌ otoꞌ.
pairs.target: We always give thanks to God for all of you, mentioning you in our prayers,  remembering without ceasing your work of faith and labor of love and perseverance of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, before our God and Father.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, koꞌih puꞌan nang Topaꞌ ngibalaꞌ ingan, Iyoh moꞌ pilih ingan odaꞌ jadin nyaꞌa deꞌ jok-e Yoh deꞌ kakuꞌ.
pairs.target: We know, brothers loved by God, that you are chosen,

pairs.source: Koꞌih tanon Gah deꞌ Paguh tuduꞌ ingan idoh diꞌ-e jok-e pakai sina sijaꞌ-e, pak-e pakai kuasa duoh pakai Iyang Topaꞌ.
