Koꞌih sukup bisayaꞌ nang Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ inoh pasti bonal.   Ingan moꞌ puꞌan watki wat pingidip koꞌih, takal koꞌih samah-samah duoh ingan.   Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai koꞌih, koꞌih nai saꞌan ingan.
pairs.target: and that our Good News came to you not in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Spirit, and with much assurance. You know what kind of men we showed ourselves to be among you for your sake.

pairs.source: Ingan moꞌ nunaꞌ tilodan koꞌih duoh tilodan Topaꞌ.   Bial-e jolaꞌ, ingan tilimaꞌ gah deꞌ tanon koꞌih tuduꞌ ingan daang ingan doon.   Dop-e deꞌ odaꞌ ingan doon inoh Iyang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: You became imitators of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Spirit,

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, ingan moꞌ jadin soto saꞌan suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus deꞌ Makedonia duoh deꞌ Akhaya.
pairs.target: so that you became an example to all who believe in Macedonia and in Achaia.

pairs.source: Dop-e mulai soꞌ ingan gah tentang Topaꞌ moꞌ popah nog Makedonia duoh Akhaya, idoh diꞌ-e jok-e inoh, pak-e gah oni wat pingidip ingan deꞌ moꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ tuang moꞌ nog katiꞌ kanih geh, yoh ngan diꞌ koꞌih tiyaꞌ pilelu tanon-e.
pairs.target: For from you the word of the Lord has been declared, not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith toward God has gone out; so that we need not to say anything.

pairs.source: Suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ kilakal-e nang ingan deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ tilimaꞌ koꞌih, takal koꞌih dioꞌ nog tuduꞌ ingan.   Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ kilakal watki wat ingan diꞌ ingan tiyaꞌ nyomah tipaduaꞌ, ingan moꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ deꞌ idip, deꞌ jok-e niꞌ ngan ingan yaꞌ nyomah-E.
pairs.target: For they themselves report concerning us what kind of a reception we had from you; and how you turned to God from idols, to serve a living and true God,

pairs.source: Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ kilakal gah watki wat ingan bialap kajon Onak Topaꞌ nog soꞌ siluga.   Iyoh inoh Yesus Kristus deꞌ paliꞌ idip soꞌ kobos-E.   Yesus inoh geh deꞌ nyilamat otoꞌ soꞌ ukum Topaꞌ deꞌ yaꞌ nog.
pairs.target: and to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead—Jesus, who delivers us from the wrath to come.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, ingan moꞌ puꞌan takal koꞌih nog tuduꞌ ingan ogiꞌ guna-e.
pairs.target: For you yourselves know, brothers, our visit to you wasn’t in vain,

pairs.source: Ingan puꞌan takal koꞌih aluaꞌ diꞌ koꞌih nog tuduꞌ ingan deꞌ Tesalonika, koꞌih moꞌ obuah pijolaꞌ duoh adoh-adoh wat nyaꞌa tuduꞌ koꞌih deꞌ Filipi, pak-e bial-e bogoꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ lawan koꞌih, Topaꞌ otoꞌ moꞌ odaꞌ koꞌih bilani magah tuduꞌ ingan Gah deꞌ Paguh deꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: but having suffered before and been shamefully treated, as you know, at Philippi, we grew bold in our God to tell you the Good News of God in much conflict.

pairs.source: Takal koꞌih tanon sibaya itih, idoh diꞌ-e ngan koꞌih yaꞌ odaꞌ ingan moyap soꞌ olan deꞌ bonal, doiꞌ koꞌih kalik oni-oni saꞌan odop koꞌih duoh idoh geh diꞌ-e ngan koꞌih yaꞌ ngakal ingan.
pairs.target: For our exhortation is not of error, nor of uncleanness, nor in deception.

pairs.source: Idoh diꞌ koꞌih nang sina ngan koꞌih kanuas otin manusia, pak-e koꞌih yaꞌ kanuas otin Topaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ puꞌan isiꞌ otin koꞌih.   Odop Topaꞌ deꞌ ningaꞌ nang koꞌih patut magah Gah deꞌ Paguh itih.
pairs.target: But even as we have been approved by God to be entrusted with the Good News, so we speak; not as pleasing men, but God, who tests our hearts.

pairs.source: Kodaꞌ deꞌ puꞌan ingan, doiꞌ koꞌih nang sina deꞌ mosiaꞌ-mosiaꞌ ngan koꞌih kuab niat koꞌih kalik utung soꞌ ingan.   Topaꞌ deꞌ puꞌan.
pairs.target: For neither were we at any time found using words of flattery, as you know, nor a cloak of covetousness (God is witness),

pairs.source: Idoh geh diꞌ koꞌih kalik pudi soꞌ manusia, bait soꞌ ingan, bait soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon.   Sibonal-e koꞌih deꞌ jadin rasul Kristus soꞌon mitiaꞌ oni sijaꞌ-e soꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: nor seeking glory from men (neither from you nor from others), when we might have claimed authority as apostles of Christ.

pairs.source: Pak-e koꞌih nai oniꞌ deꞌ paguh tuduꞌ ingan, samah kodaꞌ sinoꞌ somon onak-e duoh piala onak-e.
pairs.target: But we were gentle among you, like a nursing mother cherishes her own children.

pairs.source: Dop-e koꞌih ngibalaꞌ ingan, yohleh ngan koꞌih laꞌan toban Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ.   Nak-e jok-e inoh, koꞌih tuang laꞌan koꞌih geh ngin idip koꞌih ngan koꞌih tulung ingan, dop-e koꞌih ngibalaꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: Even so, affectionately longing for you, we were well pleased to impart to you, not the Good News of God only, but also our own souls, because you had become very dear to us.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, totu ingan aluaꞌ natong wat ki wat koꞌih paan tulang ngan koꞌih kiloja singonu-singalom ngan koꞌih ngilaan idip koꞌih, saꞌ-e diꞌ-e nyusah osi sijaꞌ-e takal koꞌih magah Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: For you remember, brothers, our labor and travail; for working night and day, that we might not burden any of you, we preached to you the Good News of God.

pairs.source: Dop-e ingan moꞌ ningaꞌ, wat inoh geh Topaꞌ, wat ki wat koꞌih idip bisig, idip tongon, duoh doiꞌ koꞌih nai salah, takal koꞌih idip samah-samah duoh ingan deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: You are witnesses with God, how holy, righteously, and blamelessly we behaved ourselves toward you who believe.

pairs.source: Ingan moꞌ puꞌan nang koꞌih nai suaꞌ oniꞌ saꞌan ingan samah kodaꞌ samaꞌ nai suaꞌ oniꞌ saꞌan onak-e.
pairs.target: As you know, we exhorted, comforted, and implored every one of you, as a father does his own children,

pairs.source: Koꞌih diꞌ mokuaꞌ-mokuaꞌ nogap otin ingan, koꞌih moꞌ pajak ingan odaꞌ idip nunaꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ.   Dop-e Topaꞌ moꞌ mogan ingan odaꞌ jadin umat-E duoh soꞌon pudi.
pairs.target: to the end that you should walk worthily of God, who calls you into his own Kingdom and glory.

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan koꞌih mala bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ dop-e ingan moꞌ tilimaꞌ Pingunang Topaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ magah koꞌih, ingan tilimaꞌ nang gah inoh idoh diꞌ-e soꞌ manusia, pak-e gah deꞌ bonal-bonal soꞌ Topaꞌ.   Pingunang Topaꞌ itih leh deꞌ ngubah idip ingan deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: For this cause we also thank God without ceasing, that, when you received from us the word of the message of God, you accepted it not as the word of men, but, as it is in truth, the word of God, which also works in you who believe.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, oniꞌ deꞌ ngoon ingan, tuang moꞌ ngoon uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ, deꞌ Yudea deꞌ moꞌ kakuꞌ Kristus.   Ingan ngoon susah jolaꞌ odaꞌ bangsa odop ingan samah kodaꞌ deꞌ ngoon uluk nyaꞌa bisayaꞌ deꞌ Yudea, yoh susah jolaꞌ odaꞌ ulang-ulang Yahudi.
pairs.target: For you, brothers, became imitators of the assemblies of God which are in Judea in Christ Jesus; for you also suffered the same things from your own countrymen, even as they did from the Jews;

pairs.source: Ulang-ulang Yahudi deꞌ munoꞌ deꞌ ngabos Topaꞌ Yesus duoh nabi-nabi, adin yoh moꞌ pijolaꞌ koꞌih.   Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ buꞌui tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa, Topaꞌ diꞌ-e sonang tuduꞌ odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ.
pairs.target: who killed both the Lord Jesus and their own prophets, and drove us out, and didn’t please God, and are contrary to all men;

pairs.source: Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ jaman koꞌih magah tuduꞌ bangsa deꞌ diꞌ-e Yahudi gah deꞌ tapod odaꞌ nyaꞌa silamat.   Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, ulang-ulang Yahudi deꞌ munoꞌ namah dosa-e odaꞌ lobih soꞌ deꞌ dapod Topaꞌ tilimaꞌ-e, adin Topaꞌ moꞌ ngukum-e dop-e Iyoh sikiya tiwas.
pairs.target: forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they may be saved; to fill up their sins always. But wrath has come on them to the uttermost.

pairs.source: Pak-e adin madih ayua, bial-e niꞌ tiliaꞌ geh koꞌih juuaꞌ soꞌ ingan, juuaꞌ deꞌ boton pak-e sinok daang otin koꞌih, tok-tok nyam jobong koꞌih tuduꞌ ingan, koꞌih kagaꞌ odop koꞌih ngan koꞌih bitapod duoh ingan lagiꞌ.
pairs.target: But we, brothers, being bereaved of you for a short season, in presence, not in heart, tried even harder to see your face with great desire,

pairs.source: Ogiꞌ kila koꞌih yaꞌ nog tuduꞌ ingan, okuꞌ, Paulus, moꞌ suba kudu-kudu sidoh-e, pak-e Laja Muat munua kuab olan koꞌih, yoh ngan koꞌih diꞌ ponai odi tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: because we wanted to come to you—indeed, I, Paul, once and again—but Satan hindered us.

pairs.source: Koꞌih yaꞌ bitapod duoh ingan dop-e ingan leh soꞌ koꞌih bialap deꞌ dapod odaꞌ koꞌih doon, baya odaꞌ koꞌih bilagah odop koꞌih deꞌ sulung jowin Topaꞌ Yesus takal Iyoh paliꞌ nog.
pairs.target: For what is our hope, or joy, or crown of rejoicing? Isn’t it even you, before our Lord Jesus at his coming?

pairs.source: Tok bonal, ingan leh deꞌ odaꞌ koꞌih munuas duoh soꞌon pimodo.
pairs.target: For you are our glory and our joy.

pairs.source: Koꞌih taluh moꞌ diꞌ koꞌih tiyaꞌ taan naan jobong, inoh leh ngan koꞌih pikil lobih paguh koꞌih duoh Silas loꞌo deꞌ Atena,
pairs.target: Therefore when we couldn’t stand it any longer, we thought it good to be left behind at Athens alone,

pairs.source: yohmoꞌ koꞌih odaꞌ Timotius odi tuduꞌ ingan, yoh itih dingan koꞌih deꞌ kiloja duoh koꞌih nai kiloja saꞌan Topaꞌ, magah Gah deꞌ Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ.   Koꞌih odaꞌ Timotius odi tuduꞌ ingan saꞌ yoh nogap duoh gotak ingan saꞌ-e lobih bisayaꞌ lagiꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus Kristus,
pairs.target: and sent Timothy, our brother and God’s servant in the Good News of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith;

pairs.source: saꞌ-e doiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ-e tiguyang odaꞌ susah jolaꞌ deꞌ ngoon-e.   Ingan tuang puꞌan ingan geh susah jolaꞌ deꞌ obuah otoꞌ inoh moꞌ jadin duman otoꞌ deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: that no one be moved by these afflictions. For you know that we are appointed to this task.

pairs.source: Takal koꞌih aluaꞌ samah-samah duoh ingan, koꞌih moꞌ tanon-e nang otoꞌ yaꞌ obuah susah jolaꞌ.   Adin odop ingan moꞌ puꞌan-e, dop-e oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ jadi kodaꞌ deꞌ tanon koꞌih.
pairs.target: For most certainly, when we were with you, we told you beforehand that we are to suffer affliction, even as it happened, and you know.

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan okuꞌ odaꞌ Timotius odi tuduꞌ ingan, saꞌ kuꞌ puꞌan soꞌ-e tentang bisayaꞌ ingan tuduꞌ Kristus, dop-e okuꞌ tolu jak ingan alah odaꞌ Laja Muat munua, yoh moꞌ odaꞌ kiloja koꞌih doiꞌ loti-e.
pairs.target: For this cause I also, when I couldn’t stand it any longer, sent that I might know your faith, for fear that by any means the tempter had tempted you, and our labor would have been in vain.

pairs.source: Pak-e adin Timotius moꞌ paliꞌ, iyoh moꞌ tanon gah deꞌ soꞌ ingan deꞌ odaꞌ koꞌih doon, yoh nang ingan aluaꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus duoh samah-oni ngibalaꞌ siodop ingan.   Yoh tanon tuduꞌ koꞌih nang ingan mala natong oniꞌ deꞌ paguh soꞌ koꞌih daang otin ingan.   Yoh nang ingan jobong yaꞌ bitapod duoh koꞌih, kodaꞌ koꞌih jobong yaꞌ bitapod duoh ingan.
pairs.target: But when Timothy came just now to us from you, and brought us glad news of your faith and love, and that you have good memories of us always, longing to see us, even as we also long to see you;

pairs.source: Madih ayua, inoh leh ngan-e daang koꞌih obuah pijolaꞌ duoh ngoon suaꞌ susah, gah deꞌ ngojit koꞌih nang ingan aluaꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus nogap otin koꞌih.
pairs.target: for this cause, brothers, we were comforted over you in all our distress and affliction through your faith.

pairs.source: Adin koꞌih ngoon nang idip koꞌih tok-tok biguna asal ingan totap togap daang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: For now we live, if you stand fast in the Lord.

pairs.source: Koꞌih sukup bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ daang kila deꞌ munuas, dop-e ingan togap bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: For what thanksgiving can we render again to God for you, for all the joy with which we rejoice for your sakes before our God;

pairs.source: Singonu singalom koꞌih bonal-bonal bidoa saꞌ otoꞌ bitapod jowin samah jowin, saꞌ koꞌih tapod tulung oniꞌ deꞌ pilelu ingan saꞌ ingan bonal-bonal togap bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: night and day praying exceedingly that we may see your face, and may perfect that which is lacking in your faith?

pairs.source: Koꞌih bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ baya Topaꞌ Yesus bukaꞌ olan saꞌan koꞌih, saꞌ koꞌih bitapod lagiꞌ duoh ingan.
pairs.target: Now may our God and Father himself, and our Lord Jesus Christ, direct our way to you;

pairs.source: Koꞌih telus bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ odaꞌ ingan makin bitamah ngibalaꞌ sitipan odop ingan duoh ngibalaꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa, samah kodaꞌ koꞌih ngibalaꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: and the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another, and toward all men, even as we also do toward you,

pairs.source: Moꞌ-e moꞌ wat inoh, Topaꞌ moꞌ odaꞌ otin ingan togap, saꞌ-e doiꞌ tiyaꞌ salah ingan, duoh ingan bisig deꞌ sulung jowin Topaꞌ Samaꞌ toꞌ, takal Topaꞌ Yesus nog bibaya duoh suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ-E.
pairs.target: to the end he may establish your hearts blameless in holiness before our God and Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus with all his saints.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, nyuang-nyuang-e koꞌih mitiaꞌ duoh sibaya tuduꞌ ingan daang Topaꞌ Yesus, ingan moꞌ ngojit soꞌ koꞌih watki wat ingan halus idip saꞌ Topaꞌ sonang ningaꞌ-e.   Tok ingan moꞌ idip wat inoh, pak-e koꞌih mitiaꞌ saꞌ ingan isin-isin kagaꞌ odop ingan odaꞌ lobih paguh lagiꞌ.
pairs.target: Finally then, brothers, we beg and exhort you in the Lord Jesus, that as you received from us how you ought to walk and to please God, that you abound more and more.

pairs.source: Dop-e ingan moꞌ puꞌan pingajal deꞌ mun ki deꞌ moꞌ ngajal koꞌih tuduꞌ ingan daang adon Topaꞌ Yesus.
pairs.target: For you know what instructions we gave you through the Lord Jesus.

pairs.source: Dop-e itih leh oniꞌ deꞌ yaꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ: Saꞌ ingan idip jok-e saꞌan Iyoh, bisig, maꞌ cabul.
pairs.target: For this is the will of God: your sanctification, that you abstain from sexual immorality,

pairs.source: Tibilang dali halus puꞌan watki idip duoh sowon-e pakai otin deꞌ bisig duoh pimodo tuduꞌ tipan si odop-e.
pairs.target: that each one of you know how to control his own body in sanctification and honor,

pairs.source: Maꞌ yaꞌ idip nunaꞌ asong deꞌ jaꞌat tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e lawang odop ingan, kodaꞌ deꞌ nai nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e puꞌan Topaꞌ,
pairs.target: not in the passion of lust, even as the Gentiles who don’t know God;

pairs.source: daang suaꞌ hal deꞌ kodaꞌ itih, saꞌ-e doiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ nai salah-e tuduꞌ madih-e duoh nipu-e.   Natong nyeꞌ koꞌih moꞌ isin-isin sibaya tuduꞌ ingan, Topaꞌ yaꞌ ngukum nyaꞌa deꞌ nai salah-e deꞌ wat inoh.
pairs.target: that no one should take advantage of and wrong a brother or sister in this matter; because the Lord is an avenger in all these things, as also we forewarned you and testified.

pairs.source: Topaꞌ mogan otoꞌ, odaꞌ otoꞌ idip jok-e saꞌan odop Topaꞌ, idoh diꞌ-e odaꞌ otoꞌ idip duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e lawang odop toꞌ.
pairs.target: For God called us not for uncleanness, but in sanctification.

pairs.source: Dop-e osi sijaꞌ-e deꞌ diꞌ-e tilimaꞌ pingajal itih, idoh diꞌ-e lawan manusia pak-e lawan Topaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ ngin-e geh Iyang-E tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: Therefore he who rejects this doesn’t reject man, but God, who has also given his Holy Spirit to you.

pairs.source: Tentang ngibalaꞌ tipan siodop nyeꞌ, idoh tiyaꞌ diꞌ-e pilelu koꞌih yaꞌ nulis-e tuduꞌ ingan, dop-e ingan moꞌ bilajal ngibalaꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: But concerning brotherly love, you have no need that one write to you. For you yourselves are taught by God to love one another,

pairs.source: Oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ mokuaꞌ ingan nai-e geh tuduꞌ suaꞌ madih ayua deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ Makedonia.   Pak-e madih ayua, isin-isin koꞌih sibaya-e saꞌ ingan ngibalaꞌ siodop ingan lobih paguh soꞌ deꞌ moꞌ nai ingan.
pairs.target: for indeed you do it toward all the brothers who are in all Macedonia. But we exhort you, brothers, that you abound more and more;

pairs.source: Suba nyeꞌ idip bidanah duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon, maꞌ sapul hal nyaꞌa, kiloja ngan nyeꞌ ngilaan odop ingan, kodaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ tanon koꞌih tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: and that you make it your ambition to lead a quiet life, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, even as we instructed you;

pairs.source: Moꞌ ingan moꞌ idip wat inoh, idoh diꞌ ingan idip soꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ngin nyaꞌa, saꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus tuang pimodo geh tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: that you may walk properly toward those who are outside, and may have need of nothing.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, koꞌih yaꞌ odaꞌ ingan puꞌan bonal-bonal tentang nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ kobos, saꞌ otin ingan diꞌ-e susah kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon deꞌ doiꞌ topat-e bialap.
pairs.target: But we don’t want you to be ignorant, brothers, concerning those who have fallen asleep, so that you don’t grieve like the rest, who have no hope.

pairs.source: Simoꞌ otoꞌ bisayaꞌ nang Yesus moꞌ kobos duoh moꞌ paliꞌ idip, otoꞌ tuang bisayaꞌ geh nang Topaꞌ yaꞌ paliꞌ kidip nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ kobos deꞌ moꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus, Topaꞌ yaꞌ nguluk odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ duoh Yesus.
pairs.target: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so God will bring with him those who have fallen asleep in Jesus.

pairs.source: Deꞌ tanon koꞌih itih tuduꞌ ingan yohleh pingunang deꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ: takal Topaꞌ Yesus paliꞌ nog, Iyoh yaꞌ dioꞌ toban buu nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ kobos, soꞌ otoꞌ deꞌ aluaꞌ idip.
pairs.target: For this we tell you by the word of the Lord, that we who are alive, who are left until the coming of the Lord, will in no way precede those who have fallen asleep.

pairs.source: Takal piayuh malaikat moꞌ nang bogan-e ngin pilitah duoh trompet Topaꞌ moꞌ sowoꞌ, inoh leh tanda-e odop Topaꞌ Yesus yaꞌ muun soꞌ siluga.   Mokuaꞌ inoh nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus deꞌ moꞌ kobos yaꞌ paliꞌ idip.
pairs.target: For the Lord himself will descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with God’s trumpet. The dead in Christ will rise first,

pairs.source: Mokuaꞌ inoh otoꞌ deꞌ aluaꞌ idip takal inoh, yaꞌ obuah pakat samah-samah duoh odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ daang totaꞌ abun ngan otoꞌ yaꞌ bitapod duoh Topaꞌ Yesus deꞌ longit.   Otoꞌ moꞌ loꞌo duoh Topaꞌ Yesus nah-nah.
pairs.target: then we who are alive, who are left, will be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air. So we will be with the Lord forever.

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan ingan halus samah-oni nogap otin sitipan odop ingan pakai oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ ngajal kuꞌ inoh.
pairs.target: Therefore comfort one another with these words.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, siniaꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ Yesus yaꞌ nog diꞌ koꞌih tiyaꞌ pilelu yaꞌ nulis-e tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: But concerning the times and the seasons, brothers, you have no need that anything be written to you.

pairs.source: Dop-e ingan moꞌ puꞌan-e, nang onu Topaꞌ yaꞌ nog tang-tang samah kodaꞌ pinoku nog singalom.
pairs.target: For you yourselves know well that the day of the Lord comes like a thief in the night.

pairs.source: Itiaꞌ takal nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e bisayaꞌ pikil nang suaꞌ-e moꞌ bidanah duoh aman, takal inoh leh iyoh obuah susah jolaꞌ deꞌ sukup baat-e, doiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ tapod osat soꞌ-e.   Hal inoh samah kodaꞌ dayung deꞌ bitiiaꞌ tang-tang noman toꞌin-e yaꞌ milaꞌ.
pairs.target: For when they are saying, “Peace and safety,” then sudden destruction will come on them, like birth pains on a pregnant woman; and they will in no way escape.

pairs.source: Pak-e ingan idoh diꞌ-e nyaꞌa deꞌ idip kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ daang mopung.   Jadin takal Topaꞌ paliꞌ nog, ingan diꞌ ingan gogoh kodaꞌ takal pinoku nog keꞌ boli ingan.
pairs.target: But you, brothers, aren’t in darkness, that the day should overtake you like a thief.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, tok ingan suaꞌ-e idip daang telang duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ idip daang onu jawaꞌ.   Otoꞌ idoh diꞌ-e nyaꞌa deꞌ idip daang mopung duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ idip daang ngalom.
pairs.target: You are all children of light, and children of the day. We don’t belong to the night, nor to darkness,

pairs.source: Yoh ngan otoꞌ maꞌ yaꞌ loloꞌ kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon, otoꞌ halus ngooh, duoh pikil otoꞌ halus telang.
pairs.target: so then let’s not sleep, as the rest do, but let’s watch and be sober.

pairs.source: Takal onu ngalom nyaꞌa boꞌos, takal onu ngalom geh nyaꞌa mabuk.
pairs.target: For those who sleep, sleep in the night; and those who are drunk are drunk in the night.

pairs.source: Pak-e otoꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ samah kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ idip deꞌ onu jawaꞌ, inoh leh ngan pikil otoꞌ halus telang, otoꞌ totap halus bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ duoh ngibalaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon baya bialap punuaꞌ nang Topaꞌ yaꞌ nyilamat otoꞌ.   Suaꞌ-e deꞌ munoꞌ leh deꞌ jadin bojuh bosi ngan nyeꞌ jaga odop nyeꞌ.
pairs.target: But let us, since we belong to the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love, and, for a helmet, the hope of salvation.

pairs.source: Topaꞌ pilih otoꞌ ngan-e yaꞌ nyilamat otoꞌ pakai Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus, idoh diꞌ-e ngan-e yaꞌ ngukum otoꞌ.
pairs.target: For God didn’t appoint us to wrath, but to the obtaining of salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,

pairs.source: Yesus deꞌ moꞌ kobos saꞌan otoꞌ, saꞌ otoꞌ dapod idip samah-samah duoh odop-E takal Iyoh paliꞌ nog, an takal inoh otoꞌ aluaꞌ idip, an takal inoh otoꞌ moꞌ kobos.
pairs.target: who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan ingan halus totap nogap otin siodop ingan, kodaꞌ deꞌ nai ingan adin.
pairs.target: Therefore exhort one another, and build each other up, even as you also do.

pairs.source: Madih ayua isin-isin koꞌih mitiaꞌ odaꞌ ingan pimodo tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ ulih-ulih kiloja saꞌan ingan, odop-e deꞌ mutiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ pilih Topaꞌ ngan-e mipin duoh ngajal ingan.
pairs.target: But we beg you, brothers, to know those who labor among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you,

pairs.source: Ingan halus bonal-bonal pimodo duoh ngibalaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ, dop-e odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ nai suaꞌ oniꞌ saꞌan ingan.   Silalu idip samah-samah duoh doiꞌ kaꞌi kalah nyeꞌ.
pairs.target: and to respect and honor them in love for their work’s sake. Be at peace among yourselves.

pairs.source: Koꞌih mitiaꞌ geh madih ayua, ngalah leh nyaꞌa deꞌ doliaꞌ-e kiloja, ngilibul leh nyaꞌa deꞌ tolu, tulung leh nyaꞌa deꞌ pilelu ingan yaꞌ tulung-e, sabal leh tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa.
pairs.target: We exhort you, brothers, admonish the disorderly, encourage the faint-hearted, support the weak, be patient toward all.

pairs.source: Pilati nyeꞌ saꞌ-e doiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ balas jaꞌat pakai jaꞌat, pak-e kagaꞌ leh nai oniꞌ deꞌ paguh siodop ingan, wat inoh geh ingan duoh suaꞌ nyaꞌa.
pairs.target: See that no one returns evil for evil to anyone, but always follow after that which is good, for one another, and for all.

pairs.source: Diꞌ nyeꞌ mokuaꞌ-mokuaꞌ doon.
pairs.target: Rejoice always.

pairs.source: Diꞌ nyeꞌ mosah-mosah bidoa.
pairs.target: Pray without ceasing.

pairs.source: Bisukul leh daang hal oni sijaꞌ-e, dop-e inoh leh deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ soꞌ ingan deꞌ moꞌ idip samah-samah duoh Kristus Yesus.
pairs.target: In everything give thanks, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus toward you.

pairs.source: Maꞌ odaꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ mokuaꞌ nai kiloja-E.
pairs.target: Don’t quench the Spirit.

pairs.source: Maꞌ ngamun sibaya deꞌ soꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ,
pairs.target: Don’t despise prophesies.

pairs.source: pak-e suaꞌ sibaya inoh halus nyeꞌ nguji-e, moꞌ-e deꞌ paguh halus nyeꞌ nunaꞌ-e,
pairs.target: Test all things, and hold firmly that which is good.

pairs.source: togan juuaꞌ-juuaꞌ-e suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ jaꞌat.
pairs.target: Abstain from every form of evil.

pairs.source: Koꞌih bidoa saꞌ odop Topaꞌ deꞌ ngin tuduꞌ ingan idip bidanah, odaꞌ ingan isin-isin idip jok-e saꞌan Topaꞌ.   Koꞌih bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ jaga suaꞌ idip ingan, bait iyang, asong duoh polong ingan, saꞌ-e doiꞌ tiyaꞌ deꞌ salah takal Topaꞌ otoꞌ Yesus Kristus paliꞌ nog.
pairs.target: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

pairs.source: Topaꞌ deꞌ mogan otoꞌ tapod nyeꞌ bisayaꞌ daꞌ-E, Iyoh geh deꞌ yaꞌ kanuaꞌ janyi-E.
pairs.target: He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

pairs.source: Madih ayua bidoa leh saꞌan koꞌih!
pairs.target: Brothers, pray for us.

pairs.source: Nginleh salam koꞌih tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus.
pairs.target: Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss.

pairs.source: Daang adon Topaꞌ okuꞌ tok-tok mitiaꞌ odaꞌ ingan basa sulat itih tuduꞌ suaꞌ madih ayua deꞌ samah-samah bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus Kristus.
pairs.target: I solemnly command you by the Lord that this letter be read to all the holy brothers.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ otoꞌ Yesus Kristus ngin bilokat tuduꞌ ingan.   Soꞌ koꞌih, Paulus, Timotius duoh Silas.     TESALONIKA
pairs.target: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.

pairs.source: Salam soꞌ koꞌih taluh, Paulus, Timotius duoh Silas, tuduꞌ uluk ulang bisayaꞌ deꞌ Tesalonika deꞌ kakuꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ duoh deꞌ kakuꞌ Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus.
pairs.target: Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy, to the assembly of the Thessalonians in God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ:

pairs.source: Koꞌih bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ otoꞌ duoh Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus ngin bilokat duoh idip bidanah tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, otin koꞌih silalu bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ, natong pingidip ingan.   Koꞌih halus duoh patut nai wat inoh, dop-e koꞌih ningaꞌ ingan makin togap bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Yesus duoh makin bitamah ngibalaꞌ tipan odop ingan.
pairs.target: We are bound to always give thanks to God for you, brothers, even as it is appropriate, because your faith grows exceedingly, and the love of each and every one of you towards one another abounds;

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan koꞌih mala silita bilagah tentang ingan ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ Tesalonika tibilang koꞌih odi nomi uluk nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ topat-topat deꞌ bokon.   Koꞌih tanon nang ingan, bial ingan obuah pijolaꞌ duoh ngoon suaꞌ susah, ingan totap togap duoh totap bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ Yesus.
pairs.target: so that we ourselves boast about you in the assemblies of God for your perseverance and faith in all your persecutions and in the afflictions which you endure.

pairs.source: Itih leh tanda-e Topaꞌ doiꞌ onu-e salah ngan-e ngadel nyaꞌa.   Ingan moꞌ susah jolaꞌ dop-e ingan silalu tunuak tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.   Inoh leh ngan Topaꞌ angap ingan patut jadin umat-E.
pairs.target: This is an obvious sign of the righteous judgment of God, to the end that you may be counted worthy of God’s Kingdom, for which you also suffer.

pairs.source: Topaꞌ yaꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ bonal.   Iyoh yaꞌ balas nyaꞌa deꞌ odaꞌ ingan susah jolaꞌ,
pairs.target: Since it is a righteous thing with God to repay affliction to those who afflict you,

pairs.source: duoh yaꞌ odaꞌ ingan lopas soꞌ susah jolaꞌ, wat inoh geh duoh koꞌih, takal Topaꞌ Yesus muun soꞌ siluga yohmoꞌ bitanga odop-E bibaya duoh ayua malaikat deꞌ ayuh kuasa-e.
pairs.target: and to give relief to you who are afflicted with us, when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his mighty angels in flaming fire,

pairs.source: Iyoh yaꞌ nog daang siduduꞌ opui ngan-e yaꞌ ngukum nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e piduli tentang Topaꞌ, baya nyaꞌa deꞌ doliaꞌ-e nunaꞌ Gah deꞌ Paguh tentang Yesus Topaꞌ otoꞌ.
pairs.target: punishing those who don’t know God, and to those who don’t obey the Good News of our Lord Jesus,

pairs.source: Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ yaꞌ obuah katuab silamaꞌ-lamaꞌ-e, obuah kasig soꞌ sulung jowin Topaꞌ duoh soꞌ kuasa-E deꞌ ayuh.
pairs.target: who will pay the penalty: eternal destruction from the face of the Lord and from the glory of his might,

pairs.source: Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ yaꞌ jadi takal Yesus paliꞌ nog, ngan-e yaꞌ tilimaꞌ pudi soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kakuꞌ-E, duoh saꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ yaꞌ pimodo tuduꞌ-E.   Ingan tuang yaꞌ suwaꞌ geh duoh odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ, dop-e ingan moꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ gah deꞌ tanon koꞌih tuduꞌ ingan.
pairs.target: when he comes in that day to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired among all those who have believed, because our testimony to you was believed.

pairs.source: Yoh leh ngan koꞌih diꞌ mokuaꞌ-mokuaꞌ bidoa saꞌan ingan', saꞌ Topaꞌ otoꞌ angap ingan patut idip nunaꞌ bogan-E.   Koꞌih bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ pakai kuasa-E odaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ paguh deꞌ laꞌan ingan nai-e tapod jadi, duoh pijadi suaꞌ oni' deꞌ paguh deꞌ moꞌ nai ingan dop-e ingan bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: To this end we also pray always for you, that our God may count you worthy of your calling, and fulfill every desire of goodness and work of faith, with power;

pairs.source: Ngan-e moꞌ wat inoh, adon Topaꞌ otoꞌ Yesus obuah pakat odaꞌ ingan.   Wat inoh geh nyaꞌa moꞌ pimodo tuduꞌ ingan odaꞌ adon Yesus.   Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ mutiꞌ jadi, dop-e ogiꞌ Otin Topaꞌ deꞌ paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ otoꞌ duoh Yesus Kristus.
pairs.target: that the name of our Lord Jesus may be glorified in you, and you in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, adin koꞌih yaꞌ nulis tentang onu Topaꞌ otoꞌ Yesus Kristus yaꞌ paliꞌ nog, duoh tentang otoꞌ deꞌ yaꞌ obuah nguluk samah-samah duoh Iyoh.   Itih leh deꞌ mitiaꞌ koꞌih bonal-bonal tuduꞌ ingan:
pairs.target: Now, brothers, concerning the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and our gathering together to him, we ask you

pairs.source: saꞌ diꞌ ingan likas bigaduh duoh ilan-e simoꞌ ingan ngojit gah nang Topaꞌ Yesus moꞌ paliꞌ nog.   Bial ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ nang pingajal inoh soꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ, soꞌ pingajal koꞌih duoh soꞌ sulat deꞌ pait koꞌih, maꞌ ingan yaꞌ bisayaꞌ.
pairs.target: not to be quickly shaken in your mind, and not be troubled, either by spirit, or by word, or by letter as if from us, saying that the day of Christ has already come.

pairs.source: Maꞌ sape yaꞌ tanah odaꞌ nyaꞌa nipu ingan! Dop-e takal aluaꞌ diꞌ-e nog onu Topaꞌ Yesus paliꞌ nog, halus dioꞌ jadi oniꞌ deꞌ mutiꞌ: Bogoꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ yaꞌ lawan Topaꞌ duoh ogiꞌ niꞌ naꞌan Manusia deꞌ Ginaka deꞌ yaꞌ bitanga odop-e.   Iyoh itih leh deꞌ moꞌ obuah notap yaꞌ obuah katuab.
pairs.target: Let no one deceive you in any way. For it will not be, unless the rebellion comes first, and the man of sin is revealed, the son of destruction,

pairs.source: Iyoh yaꞌ netang Topaꞌ duoh pakat odop-e tun suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ sobot-e nang topaꞌ duoh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nyomah manusia.   Iyoh moꞌ yaꞌ guluꞌ daang Boli Topaꞌ, yohmoꞌ magah nang odop-e inoh leh Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: he who opposes and exalts himself against all that is called God or that is worshiped; so that he sits as God in the temple of God, setting himself up as God.

pairs.source: Idoh keh diꞌ ingan natong nang suaꞌ oni deꞌ mutiꞌ moꞌ tanon kuꞌ tuduꞌ ingan, takal okuꞌ aluaꞌ loꞌo samah-samah duoh ingan?
pairs.target: Don’t you remember that, when I was still with you, I told you these things?

pairs.source: Dop-e ingan moꞌ puꞌan oni deꞌ aluaꞌ naan Manusia deꞌ Ginaka inoh bitanga odop-e.   Iyoh jok-e ponai bitanga odop-e takal onu deꞌ notap Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Now you know what is restraining him, to the end that he may be revealed in his own season.

pairs.source: Adin kuasa deꞌ odaꞌ nyaꞌa jadin ginaka moꞌ mulai kiloja otug-otug-e, pak-e aluaꞌ ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ naan.   Pak-e itiaꞌ takal nyaꞌa deꞌ naan inoh moꞌ obuah kadi,
pairs.target: For the mystery of lawlessness already works. Only there is one who restrains now, until he is taken out of the way.

pairs.source: takal inoh ke Manusia deꞌ Ginaka inoh bitanga odop-e.   Pak-e Topaꞌ Yesus yaꞌ ngabos Manusia deꞌ Ginaka inoh pakai asong soꞌ bobaꞌ-E duoh katuab Manusia deꞌ Ginaka inoh takal Iyoh nog daang jawaꞌ-E deꞌ telang.
pairs.target: Then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord will kill with the breath of his mouth, and destroy by the manifestation of his coming;

pairs.source: Manusia deꞌ Ginaka inoh yaꞌ nog pakai kuasa Laja muat.   Iyoh nai masam-masam oniꞌ deꞌ ilan nyaꞌa duoh oniꞌ deꞌ aluaꞌ doiꞌ nyaꞌa kilin-e deꞌ ponai mogo nyaꞌa.
pairs.target: even he whose coming is according to the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders,

pairs.source: Iyoh nai oni sijaꞌ-e wat-e deꞌ jaꞌat ngan-e nipu nyaꞌa deꞌ tok yaꞌ obuah katuab.   Nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ yaꞌ mutuab dop-e nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ diꞌ-e suka duoh nulak gah deꞌ bonal tentang Topaꞌ, deꞌ dapod odaꞌ yoh silamat.
pairs.target: and with all deception of wickedness for those who are being lost, because they didn’t receive the love of the truth, that they might be saved.

pairs.source: Yoh leh ngan Topaꞌ odaꞌ kila nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ moyap soꞌ olan deꞌ bonal, saꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ oni deꞌ diꞌ-e tok.
pairs.target: Because of this, God sends them a working of error, that they should believe a lie;

pairs.source: Topaꞌ odaꞌ wat inoh saꞌ odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ gah deꞌ bonal tentang Topaꞌ duoh nunaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e tok, yaꞌ obuah ukum.
pairs.target: that they all might be judged who didn’t believe the truth, but had pleasure in unrighteousness.

pairs.source: Madih ayua deꞌ ngibalaꞌ Topaꞌ, koꞌih halus silalu bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ tentang ingan, dop-e Topaꞌ moꞌ pilih ingan soꞌ sibungas-e ngan-e yaꞌ odaꞌ silamat.   Ingan silamat odaꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ, deꞌ odaꞌ ingan jadin umat Topaꞌ deꞌ idip bisig, duoh ngan ingan bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ gah deꞌ bonal tentang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: But we are bound to always give thanks to God for you, brothers loved by the Lord, because God chose you from the beginning for salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief in the truth;

pairs.source: Saꞌan inoh leh Topaꞌ mogan ingan pakai Gah deꞌ Paguh deꞌ tanon koꞌih.   Topaꞌ mogan ingan saꞌ ingan suwaꞌ soꞌon pudi samah-samah duoh Yesus Kristus Topaꞌ otoꞌ.
pairs.target: to which he called you through our Good News, for the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.

pairs.source: Yohleh ngan ingan halus totap togap duoh kagong togap pingajal deꞌ moꞌ ngin koꞌih tuduꞌ ingan, bait deꞌ tanon koꞌih pakai bobaꞌ koꞌih, bait deꞌ tanon koꞌih pakai sulat.
pairs.target: So then, brothers, stand firm, and hold the traditions which you were taught by us, whether by word, or by letter.

pairs.source: – 17 Koꞌih bidoa tuduꞌ Topaꞌ otoꞌ Yesus Kristus duoh Topaꞌ Samaꞌ otoꞌ deꞌ ngibalaꞌ otoꞌ.   Iyoh ngilibul otoꞌ duoh odaꞌ otoꞌ silalu bialap tuduꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ paguh dop-e otin-E paguh tuduꞌ otoꞌ.   Koꞌih bidoa mitiaꞌ saꞌ Iyoh ngin simangat duoh otin ingan togap ngan ingan nai suaꞌ pingunai kiloja duoh pingunang deꞌ paguh.
pairs.target: -17 Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God our Father, who loved us and gave us eternal comfort and good hope through grace,   comfort your hearts and establish you in every good work and word.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, deꞌ piobuaꞌ-e, bidoa leh saꞌan koꞌih, saꞌ gah tentang Topaꞌ Yesus likas popah duoh saꞌ nyaꞌa tilimaꞌ-e daang otin deꞌ paguh kodaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ jadi duoh ingan.
pairs.target: Finally, brothers, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may spread rapidly and be glorified, even as also with you;

pairs.source: Bidoa geh saꞌan koꞌih saꞌ Topaꞌ jaga koꞌih soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ jaꞌat duoh pingaso.   Dop-e idoh diꞌ-e suaꞌ nyaꞌa laꞌan bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: and that we may be delivered from unreasonable and evil men; for not all have faith.

pairs.source: Pak-e Topaꞌ Yesus doiꞌ onu-e bilubah.   Iyoh yaꞌ odaꞌ otin ingan togap duoh jaga ingan soꞌ Laja Muat Munua.
pairs.target: But the Lord is faithful, who will establish you, and guard you from the evil one.

pairs.source: Dop-e Yesus tulung ingan, koꞌih sukup bisayaꞌ nang ingan aluaꞌ nai suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ngajal koꞌih tuduꞌ ingan.   Koꞌih bisayaꞌ nang ingan adin aluaꞌ nai suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ngajal koꞌih inoh, duoh ingan totap telus yaꞌ nai suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ.
pairs.target: We have confidence in the Lord concerning you, that you both do and will do the things we command.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Yesus nutuan ingan saꞌ ingan ngiloti nang Topaꞌ ngibalaꞌ ingan, duoh odaꞌ ingan totap togap takal idip ingan susah jolaꞌ, samah kodaꞌ Kristus.
pairs.target: May the Lord direct your hearts into God’s love, and into the perseverance of Christ.

pairs.source: Madih ayua, daang adon Topaꞌ otoꞌ Yesus Kristus koꞌih sibaya tuduꞌ ingan, maꞌ yaꞌ bidingan duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ samah-samah bisayaꞌ pak-e' idip malas duoh deꞌ doliaꞌ-e nunaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ngajal koꞌih.
pairs.target: Now we command you, brothers, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that you withdraw yourselves from every brother who walks in rebellion, and not after the tradition which they received from us.

pairs.source: Dop-e ingan tuang moꞌ puꞌan wat ingan halus nunaꞌ tilodan idip koꞌih.   Koꞌih diꞌ koꞌih malas takal koꞌih ogiꞌ deꞌ uluk ingan.
pairs.target: For you know how you ought to imitate us. For we didn’t behave ourselves rebelliously among you,

pairs.source: Doiꞌ sidoh koꞌih man pinguman nyaꞌa, deꞌ diꞌ koꞌih bayal-e, pak-e koꞌih lolah posah kiloja singonu singalom, saꞌ diꞌ koꞌih nyusah ingan.
pairs.target: neither did we eat bread from anyone’s hand without paying for it, but in labor and travail worked night and day, that we might not burden any of you;

pairs.source: Sibonal-e koꞌih tuang ogiꞌ geh hak koꞌih mitiaꞌ odaꞌ ingan tulung koꞌih, pak-e doliaꞌ koꞌih mitiaꞌ tuduꞌ ingan, dop-e koꞌih yaꞌ jadin tilodan saꞌan ingan.
pairs.target: not because we don’t have the right, but to make ourselves an example to you, that you should imitate us.

pairs.source: Takal koꞌih ogiꞌ deꞌ uluk ingan, koꞌih moꞌ nai atulan itih, “Nyaꞌa deꞌ doliaꞌ-e kiloja, maꞌ yaꞌ man.   ”
pairs.target: For even when we were with you, we commanded you this: “If anyone will not work, don’t let him eat.”

pairs.source: Koꞌih tanon in itih, dop-e koꞌih ngojit nang ogiꞌ ayua nyaꞌa deꞌ malas daang uluk ingan.   Nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ doliaꞌ-e kiloja, yoh jok-e suka sapul hal nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon.
pairs.target: For we hear of some who walk among you in rebellion, who don’t work at all, but are busybodies.

pairs.source: Daang adon Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus koꞌih mitiaꞌ bonal-bonal tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ duoh koꞌih ngin pilitah tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ, saꞌ yoh bidanah nai pingunai kiloja-e duoh kalik man-e sadiꞌ-e.
pairs.target: Now those who are that way, we command and exhort in the Lord Jesus Christ, that with quietness they work, and eat their own bread.

pairs.source: Pak-e ingan maꞌ yaꞌ buwon nai oniꞌ deꞌ paguh.
pairs.target: But you, brothers, don’t be weary in doing what is right.

pairs.source: Pilati nyeꞌ bonal-bonal-e nyaꞌa deꞌ doliaꞌ-e nunaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nulis koꞌih daang sulat itih.   Maꞌ yaꞌ bidingan duoh-e, saꞌ-e dasaꞌ.
pairs.target: If any man doesn’t obey our word in this letter, note that man, that you have no company with him, to the end that he may be ashamed.

pairs.source: Pak-e maꞌ yaꞌ bitomi duoh-e, ngin nasehat tuduꞌ-e kodaꞌ madih daang Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Don’t count him as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Yesus deꞌ jadin puꞌun idip bidanah, silalu ngin idip bidanah tuduꞌ ingan daang suaꞌ oniꞌ.   Okuꞌ bidoa geh saꞌ Topaꞌ Yesus totap ogiꞌ duoh ingan.
pairs.target: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

pairs.source: Salam soꞌ okuꞌ, Paulus.   Tongan odop kuꞌ deꞌ nulis nyuang sina daang sulat itih, wat itih leh wat okuꞌ nulis.   Wat itih leh wat tanda daang suaꞌ sulat kuꞌ.
pairs.target: The greeting of me, Paul, with my own hand, which is the sign in every letter: this is how I write.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Yesus Kristus Topaꞌ otoꞌ ngin bilokat tuduꞌ suaꞌ ingan.   Soꞌ koꞌih, Paulus, Timotius duoh Silas.
pairs.target: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.
Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ according to the commandment of God our Savior and the Lord Jesus Christ our hope;

pairs.source: Sulat soꞌ okuꞌ, Paulus, deꞌ jadin rasul Kristus Yesus nunaꞌ deꞌ pilitah Topaꞌ, Pinyilamat otoꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus deꞌ jadin puꞌun soꞌ otoꞌ bialap.   Okuꞌ nulis sulat itih tuduꞌ muꞌu, Timotius deꞌ ngakuꞌ kuꞌ nyam onak odop kuꞌ, dop-e muꞌu moꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.   Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ bilokat duoh ngin pilasiꞌ, baya ngin idip bidanah tuduꞌ muꞌu.
pairs.target: to Timothy, my true child in faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

pairs.source: Takal okuꞌ yaꞌ lanyut pimonu kuꞌ ke' Makedonia, okuꞌ moꞌ pajak muꞌu odaꞌ loꞌo deꞌ Efesus duoh nasehat nyaꞌa danoꞌ, dop-e ogiꞌ nyaꞌa ngajal oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e bonal, muꞌu halus jaman iyoh nai oniꞌ deꞌ wat inoh.
pairs.target: As I urged you when I was going into Macedonia, stay at Ephesus that you might command certain men not to teach a different doctrine,

pairs.source: Tanon tuduꞌ odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ saꞌ-e diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ ngajal donan duoh silita asal usul deꞌ diꞌ-e obuaꞌ-obuaꞌ.   Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ jok-e odaꞌ nyaꞌa bikalah, nak-e odaꞌ nyaꞌa nai oniꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ.   Otoꞌ ponai nai oniꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ jok-e takal otoꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ-E.
pairs.target: and not to pay attention to myths and endless genealogies, which cause disputes, rather than God’s stewardship, which is in faith—

pairs.source: Ngan kuꞌ in itih saꞌ nyaꞌa ogiꞌ otin osuap-e deꞌ bisig, duoh bonal-bonal bisayaꞌ.   Moꞌ-e moꞌ wat inoh, iyoh moꞌ ponai ngibalaꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa.
pairs.target: but the goal of this command is love, out of a pure heart and a good conscience and sincere faith;

pairs.source: Pak-e ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ idip wat inoh, iyoh moꞌ moyap soꞌ olan deꞌ bonal odaꞌ sina deꞌ doiꞌ guna-e.
pairs.target: from which things some, having missed the mark, have turned away to vain talking;

pairs.source: Odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ sukup bilani-e sobot nang odop-e ngajal atulan Topaꞌ deꞌ nulis Musa, pak-e doiꞌ-e nak ngiloti oniꞌ deꞌ ngajal-e.
pairs.target: desiring to be teachers of the law, though they understand neither what they say, nor about what they strongly affirm.

pairs.source: Otoꞌ puꞌan nang atulan deꞌ nulis Musa tok paguh moꞌ nyeꞌ pakai wat deꞌ bonal.
pairs.target: But we know that the law is good, if a person uses it lawfully,

pairs.source: Otoꞌ mesti natong atulan Topaꞌ deꞌ nulis Musa, idoh diꞌ-e saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ bonal, pak-e saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ suka lawan atulan duoh nyaꞌa deꞌ jaꞌat, nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e puꞌan Topaꞌ, saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ bidosa, saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e piduli Topaꞌ duoh saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ doiꞌ agama-e, saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ pingabos samaꞌ duoh sinoꞌ-e, saꞌan suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ pingabos,
pairs.target: as knowing this, that law is not made for a righteous person, but for the lawless and insubordinate, for the ungodly and sinners, for the unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,

pairs.source: saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ ngaso nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e lawang odop-e, saꞌan dali deꞌ nyonal samah dali-e, nyaꞌa deꞌ takap nyaꞌa yohmoꞌ juaꞌ-e, saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ pimogo, saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ nang janyi pibulaꞌ-e, duoh osi sijaꞌ-e deꞌ lawan pingajal deꞌ bonal.
pairs.target: for the sexually immoral, for homosexuals, for slave-traders, for liars, for perjurers, and for any other thing contrary to the sound doctrine;

pairs.source: Pingajal deꞌ bonal inoh ogiꞌ daang Gah Paguh soꞌ Topaꞌ deꞌ sukup ayuh kuasa-E, deꞌ patut otoꞌ mudi-E.   Iyoh moꞌ odaꞌ okuꞌ magah Gah deꞌ Paguh inoh.
pairs.target: according to the Good News of the glory of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bisukul tuduꞌ Kristus Yesus Topaꞌ otoꞌ deꞌ moꞌ nogap okuꞌ duoh bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ okuꞌ odaꞌ layan odop-E, dop-e Iyoh moꞌ angap okuꞌ moꞌ bitotok nai kiloja inoh.
pairs.target: And I thank him who enabled me, Christ Jesus our Lord, because he counted me faithful, appointing me to service;

pairs.source: Deꞌ dioꞌ soꞌ kanoꞌ, okuꞌ lika pijaꞌat Iyoh, lika pijolaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ-E.   Pak-e Iyoh moꞌ masiꞌ tuduꞌ okuꞌ, dop-e okuꞌ aluaꞌ diꞌ kuꞌ bisayaꞌ, okuꞌ diꞌ kuꞌ puꞌan suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai kuꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ.
pairs.target: although I was before a blasphemer, a persecutor, and insolent. However, I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.

pairs.source: Topaꞌ otoꞌ telus tanon tuduꞌ okuꞌ, nang odop-E ngibalaꞌ okuꞌ duoh paguh tuduꞌ okuꞌ, Iyoh geh deꞌ odaꞌ okuꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ odop-E, duoh ngibalaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon.   Wat itih leh wat-e moꞌ otoꞌ moꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus.
pairs.target: The grace of our Lord abounded exceedingly with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

pairs.source: Pingunang itih bonal, patut nyeꞌ tilimaꞌ suaꞌ-e, “Kristus Yesus nog kaang dunia nyilamat nyaꞌa deꞌ bidosa.” Yohmoꞌ soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bidosa, okuꞌ leh deꞌ paling bidosa-e.
pairs.target: The saying is faithful and worthy of all acceptance, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.

pairs.source: Pak-e bial kuꞌ wat inoh, Topaꞌ masiꞌ deꞌ okuꞌ, saꞌ Kristus Yesus bitanga sabal-E tuduꞌ okuꞌ deꞌ paling bidosa, moꞌ-e moꞌ wat inoh, okuꞌ moꞌ jadin soto saꞌan suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ sunih bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ-E duoh soꞌon idip duoh Topaꞌ deꞌ nah-nah.
pairs.target: However, for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first, Jesus Christ might display all his patience, for an example of those who were going to believe in him for eternal life.

pairs.source: Topaꞌ Laja suaꞌ jaman, patut otoꞌ pimodo tuduꞌ-E duoh silalu otoꞌ mudi-E.   Iyoh diꞌ-e ponai kobos, diꞌ toꞌ ponai kilin-E, Topaꞌ deꞌ niꞌ geh! Amin.
pairs.target: Now to the King eternal, immortal, invisible, to God who alone is wise, be honor and glory forever and ever. Amen.

pairs.source: Timotius deꞌ nyam onak odop kuꞌ, itih sibaya kuꞌ tuduꞌ muꞌu, kodaꞌ sina deꞌ dioꞌ Iyang Topaꞌ tanon tentang oniꞌ deꞌ yaꞌ obuah muꞌu, sina inoh leh deꞌ nogap muꞌu saꞌ muꞌu tapod lawan nyaꞌa deꞌ ngajal oniꞌ deꞌ salah, lawan pakai pingajal deꞌ bonal daang nyeꞌ bisayaꞌ, duoh pakai otin osuap deꞌ bisig.
pairs.target: This instruction I commit to you, my child Timothy, according to the prophecies which were given to you before, that by them you may wage the good warfare;

pairs.source: Ogiꞌ geh ayua deꞌ diꞌ-e nunaꞌ otin osuap-e, inoh leh ngan diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ bisayaꞌ.
pairs.target: holding faith and a good conscience; which some having thrust away made a shipwreck concerning the faith;

pairs.source: Deꞌ soꞌ odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ, Himeneus duoh Aleksander, soꞌ duwoh odop-e moꞌ mokuaꞌ kuꞌ ngukum-e nyelah tuduꞌ Laja Muat, saꞌ-e bilajal diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ pijaꞌat Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: of whom are Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I delivered to Satan, that they might be taught not to blaspheme.

pairs.source: Bonal-bonal kuꞌ sibaya deꞌ ingan, odaꞌ ingan bidoa saꞌan suaꞌ nyaꞌa, bidoa mitiaꞌ deꞌ Topaꞌ saꞌ-E tulung odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ, nyeꞌ moꞌ bisukul saꞌan suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ nai-E tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa,
pairs.target: I exhort therefore, first of all, that petitions, prayers, intercessions, and givings of thanks, be made for all men:

pairs.source: bidoa saꞌan laja-laja duoh suaꞌ piayuh, saꞌ otoꞌ dapod idip aman duoh bidanah daang otoꞌ nyomah Topaꞌ, duoh nai oniꞌ deꞌ bonal deꞌ jowin Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: for kings and all who are in high places; that we may lead a tranquil and quiet life in all godliness and reverence.

pairs.source: Inoh leh deꞌ paguh duoh deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ, Pinyilamat otoꞌ.
pairs.target: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Savior;

pairs.source: Iyoh laꞌan saꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa silamat duoh puꞌan oniꞌ deꞌ bonal.
pairs.target: who desires all people to be saved and come to full knowledge of the truth.

pairs.source: Dop-e Topaꞌ jok-e niꞌ duoh jok-e niꞌ geh deꞌ dapod odaꞌ Topaꞌ duoh manusia bidamai, Iyoh inoh Kristus Yesus,
pairs.target: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,

pairs.source: deꞌ moꞌ nyelah Odop-E ngan-e nubuas suaꞌ manusia deꞌ bidosa.   Wat inoh leh wat-e Topaꞌ tanon odop-E nyilamat manusia daang onu deꞌ moꞌ notap-E.
pairs.target: who gave himself as a ransom for all; the testimony in its own times;

pairs.source: Yoh ngan Topaꞌ moꞌ pilih okuꞌ odaꞌ jadin rasul, odi magah duoh ngajal bangsa deꞌ diꞌ-e Yahudi saꞌ-e bisayaꞌ duoh puꞌan ajal deꞌ bonal.   Oni' deꞌ nang kuꞌ tih bonal, okuꞌ diꞌ kuꞌ pibulaꞌ!
pairs.target: to which I was appointed a preacher and an apostle (I am telling the truth in Christ, not lying), a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ mitiaꞌ daki-daki sijaꞌ-e takal ingan tikuluk nyomah Topaꞌ, bala dali deꞌ bidoa pakat tongan-e daang otin-e halus bisig diꞌ-e tiwas duoh diꞌ-e bikalah takal-e bidoa.
pairs.target: I desire therefore that the men in every place pray, lifting up holy hands without anger and doubting.

pairs.source: Wat inoh geh bala dayung, pakai leh pimakai deꞌ patut duoh sinunuh, buak-e maꞌ yaꞌ ngabun lobih-lobih, dusah nyeꞌ pakai mas, intan, duoh balang-balang deꞌ maal,
pairs.target: In the same way, that women also adorn themselves in decent clothing, with modesty and propriety; not just with braided hair, gold, pearls, or expensive clothing;

pairs.source: pak-e odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ halus ngabun odop-e pakai pingunai deꞌ paguh, kodaꞌ deꞌ patut bala dayung deꞌ taat tuduꞌ Topaꞌ nai-e.
pairs.target: but (which becomes women professing godliness) with good works.

pairs.source: Dayung halus loꞌo ngojit pingajal deꞌ tanon nyaꞌa yohmoꞌ nunaꞌ-e.
pairs.target: Let a woman learn in quietness with full submission.

pairs.source: Idoh diꞌ kuꞌ odaꞌ bala dayung ngajal duoh militah dali, yoh halus loꞌo ngojit jaꞌ-e,
pairs.target: But I don’t permit a woman to teach, nor to exercise authority over a man, but to be in quietness.

pairs.source: dop-e deꞌ dioꞌ Topaꞌ nai-e Adam, mokuaꞌ inoh ke Iyoh nai Hawa.
pairs.target: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.

pairs.source: Yohmoꞌ idoh diꞌ-e Adam deꞌ obuah nipu, pak-e dayung leh deꞌ obuah nipu, iyoh moꞌ ngilangal sibaya Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: Adam wasn’t deceived, but the woman, being deceived, has fallen into disobedience;

pairs.source: Bial-e moꞌ wat inoh, dayung yaꞌ silamat dop-e yoh milaꞌ bilanak, asal-e bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus duoh totap ngibalaꞌ nyaꞌa daang-e idip bisig nunaꞌ sibaya Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: but she will be saved through her childbearing, if they continue in faith, love, and sanctification with sobriety.

pairs.source: Pingunang itih tok bonal, “Nyaꞌa deꞌ ogiꞌ niat-e yaꞌ jadin pimipin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ, loti-e nyaꞌa deꞌ laꞌan nai kiloja deꞌ biloga.”
pairs.target: This is a faithful saying: if a man seeks the office of an overseer, he desires a good work.

pairs.source: Nyaꞌa deꞌ mipin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ halus nyaꞌa deꞌ idip-e tongon, jok-e niꞌ sowon-e, taan nijon odop-e, bijak daang idip-e, paguh ulah gaya-e, suka tilimaꞌ nyaꞌa ngilumon deꞌ boli-e, duoh ponai ngajal nyaꞌa,
pairs.target: The overseer therefore must be without reproach, the husband of one wife, temperate, sensible, modest, hospitable, good at teaching;

pairs.source: diꞌ-e pimabuk, diꞌ-e pimalah, pak-e nyaꞌa deꞌ paguh otin-e duoh paguh tuduꞌ nyaꞌa, diꞌ-e odaꞌ duit nguasa idip-e,
pairs.target: not a drinker, not violent, not greedy for money, but gentle, not quarrelsome, not covetous;

pairs.source: iyoh halus ponai ngatul lomin boli-e, ngajal odaꞌ onak opot-e ngojit oniꞌ deꞌ nang-e duoh pimodo tuduꞌ odop-e.
pairs.target: one who rules his own house well, having children in subjection with all reverence;

pairs.source: Simoꞌ iyoh diꞌ-e ponai ngatul lomin boli-e, wat ki wat iyoh yaꞌ ngatul uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ?
pairs.target: (but if a man doesn’t know how to rule his own house, how will he take care of the assembly of God?)

pairs.source: Nyaꞌa deꞌ jadin pimipin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ maꞌ yaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ tuang-e suwaꞌ bisayaꞌ, jak-e tiaꞌ iyoh moꞌ samuh, iyoh moꞌ obuah ukum kodaꞌ Laja Muat noꞌuh-e.
pairs.target: not a new convert, lest being puffed up he fall into the same condemnation as the devil.

pairs.source: Iyoh halus nyaꞌa deꞌ mala nyaꞌa sobot nang iyoh paguh daang uluk nyaꞌa, dop-e moꞌ-e diꞌ-e wat inoh, jak nyaꞌa ngituang sobot-e ngan nyaꞌa pilabuꞌ-e, iyoh moꞌ obuah jolat Laja Muat.
pairs.target: Moreover he must have good testimony from those who are outside, to avoid falling into reproach and the snare of the devil.

pairs.source: Nyaꞌa deꞌ tukang tulung pimipin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ, halus nyaꞌa deꞌ pimodo nyaꞌa daꞌ-a, pingunang-e dapod nyaꞌa bisayaꞌ daꞌ-a, diꞌ-e sikiya dolas nuak tuak anggul, diꞌ-e pinganguak.
pairs.target: Servants, in the same way, must be reverent, not double-tongued, not addicted to much wine, not greedy for money;

pairs.source: Iyoh halus bikagong togap tuduꞌ oniꞌ soꞌ-e bisayaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ tanon Topaꞌ, duoh idip daang otin osuap deꞌ bisig.
pairs.target: holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience.

pairs.source: Iyoh halus nyeꞌ nguji dioꞌ, asal idip-e tongon ke nyeꞌ pakat-e .
pairs.target: Let them also first be tested; then let them serve if they are blameless.

pairs.source: Wat inoh geh sowon-e, halus nyaꞌa deꞌ pimodo nyaꞌa daꞌ-a, diꞌ-e suka nyalah nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon, taan nijon odop-e, tapod nyeꞌ bisayaꞌ daꞌ-a daang oni sijaꞌ-e.
pairs.target: Their wives in the same way must be reverent, not slanderers, temperate, faithful in all things.

pairs.source: Nyaꞌa deꞌ tukang tulung pimipin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ halus bonon deꞌ niꞌ geh sowon-e, iyoh moꞌ puꞌan wat-e ngatul onak opot-e duoh lomin boli-e odaꞌ paguh.
pairs.target: Let servants be husbands of one wife, ruling their children and their own houses well.

pairs.source: Nyaꞌa deꞌ tukang tulung pimipin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ, moꞌ iyoh nai kiloja deꞌ paguh, nyaꞌa yaꞌ pimodo daꞌ-a, yohmoꞌ dapod tanon Kristus Yesus deꞌ soꞌ-e bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa.
pairs.target: For those who have served well gain for themselves a good standing, and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ nulis sulat itih tuduꞌ muꞌu daang kuꞌ alap okuꞌ dapod likas odi tuduꞌ muꞌu.
pairs.target: These things I write to you, hoping to come to you shortly;

pairs.source: Pak-e moꞌ kuꞌ lamat odi, muꞌu moꞌ puꞌan-e soꞌ sulat itih oni wat pingidip nyaꞌa deꞌ jadin lawang Topaꞌ, nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ deꞌ idip.   Nyaꞌa deꞌ mutiꞌ samah kodaꞌ tiang deꞌ naan boli, nyaꞌa deꞌ mutiꞌ leh deꞌ jaga pingajal deꞌ bonal soꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: but if I wait long, that you may know how men ought to behave themselves in God’s house, which is the assembly of the living God, the pillar and ground of the truth.

pairs.source: Tok-tok bonal pingajal deꞌ moꞌ tanon Topaꞌ tuduꞌ otoꞌ! Doiꞌ nyaꞌa dapod sukan-e: Iyoh deꞌ moꞌ tanon odop-E pakai polong manusia, Iyang Topaꞌ moꞌ nang Iyoh tok bonal, malaikat-malaikat moꞌ kilin-E.   Iyoh obuah magah deꞌ uluk bangsa-bangsa deꞌ diꞌ-e puꞌan Topaꞌ, Iyoh deꞌ obuah bisayaꞌ daang dunia, Iyoh deꞌ obuah pakat kaang siluga.
pairs.target: Without controversy, the mystery of godliness is great: God was revealed in the flesh, justified in the spirit, seen by angels, preached among the nations, believed on in the world, and received up in glory.

pairs.source: Iyang Topaꞌ moꞌ telang-telang tanon nang deꞌ nyuang-nyuang joman, bogoꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ togan Kristus Yesus, diꞌ-e bisayaꞌ, yohmoꞌ nunaꞌ pingajal deꞌ salah deꞌ nog soꞌ muat munua,
pairs.target: But the Spirit says expressly that in later times some will fall away from the faith, paying attention to seducing spirits and doctrines of demons,

pairs.source: deꞌ tanon nyaꞌa deꞌ pulaꞌ-pulaꞌ paguh ngan-e mogo.   Otin osuap-e diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ puꞌan oniꞌ deꞌ bonal duoh deꞌ salah.
pairs.target: through the hypocrisy of men who speak lies, branded in their own conscience as with a hot iron;

pairs.source: Nyaꞌa deꞌ pibulaꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ jaman nyaꞌa kawin.   Ogiꞌ geh pinguman deꞌ jaman-e nyaꞌa man-e, tiap Topaꞌ deꞌ nai pinguman kan-e odaꞌ nyaꞌa man-e.   Nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ Topaꞌ, deꞌ puꞌan ajal deꞌ bonal, tilimaꞌ-e simadi-e bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: forbidding marriage and commanding to abstain from foods which God created to be received with thanksgiving by those who believe and know the truth.

pairs.source: Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai Topaꞌ paguh, niꞌ tuang doiꞌ geh oniꞌ deꞌ nang nyaꞌa polih asal nyeꞌ moꞌ tilimaꞌ-e simadi nyeꞌ bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: For every creature of God is good, and nothing is to be rejected, if it is received with thanksgiving.

pairs.source: Dop-e pingunang Topaꞌ duoh doa deꞌ odaꞌ pinguman diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ polih nyeꞌ man-e.
pairs.target: For it is sanctified through the word of God and prayer.

pairs.source: Moꞌ muꞌ ngajal suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ tuduꞌ madih ayua toꞌ deꞌ moꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ Kristus Yesus, muꞌu moꞌ jadin kuli Kristus Yesus deꞌ paguh.   Moꞌ-e moꞌ wat inoh muꞌu moꞌ konyat tuduꞌ sina Topaꞌ deꞌ soꞌ toꞌ bisayaꞌ duoh pingajal deꞌ paguh deꞌ moꞌ nunaꞌ muꞌ tian-tian itih.
pairs.target: If you instruct the brothers of these things, you will be a good servant of Christ Jesus, nourished in the words of the faith, and of the good doctrine which you have followed.

pairs.source: Maꞌ yaꞌ suwaꞌ nunaꞌ silita deꞌ odaꞌ nyeꞌ moyap soꞌ Topaꞌ duoh donan deꞌ doiꞌ guna-e, pak-e kanyat negeh odop muꞌ nunaꞌ oni deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: But refuse profane and old wives’ fables. Exercise yourself toward godliness.

pairs.source: Latih gonan saꞌ-e sehat jok-e biguna saꞌan gonan, pak-e latih odop nyeꞌ nunaꞌ oni deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ biguna saꞌan suaꞌ oniꞌ, dop-e ogiꞌ janyi-E, paguh saꞌan pingidip nyeꞌ deꞌ adin duoh tiaꞌ ijoꞌ.
pairs.target: For bodily exercise has some value, but godliness has value in all things, having the promise of the life which is now, and of that which is to come.

pairs.source: Pingunang itih tok bonal patut nyeꞌ tilimaꞌ duoh bisayaꞌ daꞌ-a.
pairs.target: This saying is faithful and worthy of all acceptance.

pairs.source: Noh leh ngan toꞌ ulih-ulih kiloja duoh bijuang, dop-e otoꞌ bialap punuaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ deꞌ idip, Iyoh Pinyilamat suaꞌ nyaꞌa, amot-e nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ.
pairs.target: For to this end we both labor and suffer reproach, because we have set our trust in the living God, who is the Savior of all men, especially of those who believe.

pairs.source: Ngajal leh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ mutiꞌ nyeꞌ moꞌ tanon odaꞌ nunaꞌ-e.
pairs.target: Command and teach these things.

pairs.source: Maꞌ sape diꞌ nyaꞌa pimodo tuduꞌ muꞌu, ningaꞌ umul muꞌ aluaꞌ mudaꞌ.   Muꞌu jadin leh tilodan saꞌan nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ, bait daang sina duoh ulah gaya muꞌ, daang muꞌ ngibalaꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa duoh bisayaꞌ deꞌ Kristus Yesus daang idip muꞌ deꞌ bisig.
pairs.target: Let no man despise your youth; but be an example to those who believe, in word, in your way of life, in love, in spirit, in faith, and in purity.

pairs.source: Simadi muꞌ kajon okuꞌ nog, muꞌu halus mala basa buk Kitab tuduꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa, nyeꞌ moꞌ tanon loti-e daang nyeꞌ ngajal-e.
pairs.target: Until I come, pay attention to reading, to exhortation, and to teaching.

pairs.source: Telus-telus nyeꞌ pakai oni deꞌ moꞌ ngin Iyang Topaꞌ tuduꞌ muꞌu.   Iyang Topaꞌ ngin-e takal pimipin-pimipin nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ bisayaꞌ posan tongan-e deꞌ tun bak muꞌu, yoh moꞌ dioꞌ tanon tentang muꞌu.
pairs.target: Don’t neglect the gift that is in you, which was given to you by prophecy, with the laying on of the hands of the elders.

pairs.source: Nai negeh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ bonal-bonal-e saꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa ningaꞌ nang muꞌu simakin togap bisayaꞌ.
pairs.target: Be diligent in these things. Give yourself wholly to them, that your progress may be revealed to all.

pairs.source: Jaga ulah gaya muꞌ duoh oniꞌ deꞌ ngajal muꞌ, maꞌ yaꞌ buwon nai oniꞌ deꞌ wat inoh, dop-e moꞌ muꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ wat inoh, bait odop muꞌ, bait nyaꞌa deꞌ ngojit oni' deꞌ ngajal muꞌ yaꞌ silamat.
pairs.target: Pay attention to yourself, and to your teaching. Continue in these things, for in doing this you will save both yourself and those who hear you.

pairs.source: Maꞌ sikiya ulih-ulih ngalah nyaꞌa deꞌ nyoma soꞌ odop muꞌ, pak-e muꞌu ngijaꞌ yoh ngojit oniꞌ deꞌ nang muꞌ, kodaꞌ muꞌu sina duoh samaꞌ odop muꞌ.   Muꞌu ngalah nyaꞌa deꞌ mudaꞌ soꞌ odop muꞌ kodaꞌ muꞌ ngalah sudiꞌ muꞌ,
pairs.target: Don’t rebuke an older man, but exhort him as a father; the younger men as brothers;

pairs.source: duoh dayung-dayung deꞌ nyoma kodaꞌ sinoꞌ odop muꞌ.   Dayung-dayung deꞌ mudaꞌ muꞌ angap kodaꞌ sudiꞌ odop muꞌ, pakai otin deꞌ bisig.
pairs.target: the elder women as mothers; the younger as sisters, in all purity.

pairs.source: Pimodo duoh tulung leh janda-janda deꞌ bonal-bonal idip sadiꞌ-e.
pairs.target: Honor widows who are widows indeed.

pairs.source: Pak-e moꞌ nyam ogiꞌ janda deꞌ ogiꞌ onak-e keh sukun-e keh, odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ leh deꞌ halus dioꞌ piduli pingoma-e, duoh balas oni deꞌ paguh deꞌ moꞌ nai pingoma-e keh sumuk-e keh tuduꞌ odop-e.   Dop-e pingunai deꞌ wat inoh leh deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: But if any widow has children or grandchildren, let them learn first to show piety towards their own family, and to repay their parents, for this is  acceptable in the sight of God.

pairs.source: Janda deꞌ tok-tok idip sadiꞌ-e, doiꞌ osi-osi deꞌ yaꞌ ngilaan idip-e, iyoh jok-e bialap deꞌ Topaꞌ.   Singonu singalom yoh bidoa mitiaꞌ deꞌ Topaꞌ odaꞌ tulung odop-e.
pairs.target: Now she who is a widow indeed, and desolate, has her hope set on God, and continues in petitions and prayers night and day.

pairs.source: Pak-e janda deꞌ idip jok-e kalik odaꞌ odop-e puas, bial iyoh aluaꞌ idip, pak-e idip-e doiꞌ loti-e samah kodaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ kobos.
pairs.target: But she who gives herself to pleasure is dead while she lives.

pairs.source: Tanon tuduꞌ janda-janda deꞌ munoꞌ odaꞌ nunaꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ mutiꞌ, saꞌ pingidip-e doiꞌ nyaꞌa sobot nang jaꞌat.
pairs.target: Also command these things, that they may be without reproach.

pairs.source: Pak-e moꞌ nyam-e ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e ngilaan madih ayua-e, amot-e lawang odop-e, nyaꞌa deꞌ wat inoh moꞌ diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus Yesus, iyoh lobih jaꞌat soꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ diꞌ-e bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus Yesus.
pairs.target: But if anyone doesn’t provide for his own, and especially his own household, he has denied the faith, and is worse than an unbeliever.

pairs.source: Dayung deꞌ kibalot nyeꞌ adon-e daang ituang nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ janda deꞌ yaꞌ obuah tulung iyoh leh: janda deꞌ umul-e mulai soꞌ nuam puluꞌ sowaꞌ, deꞌ jok-e niꞌ sidoh geh iyoh bibonon,
pairs.target: Let no one be enrolled as a widow under sixty years old, having been the wife of one man,

pairs.source: deꞌ puꞌan nyaꞌa nang dayung deꞌ moꞌ nai pingunai kiloja deꞌ paguh kodaꞌ: ngilaan onak opot-e odaꞌ ayuh, sonang tilimaꞌ nyaꞌa ngilumon deꞌ boli-e takal nyaꞌa pilelu topat-e soꞌ-e yaꞌ ngilumon, suka sidia suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ pilelu nyaꞌa deꞌ bisayaꞌ, tulung nyaꞌa deꞌ susah jolaꞌ, duoh suka nai suaꞌ pingunai kiloja deꞌ paguh.
pairs.target: being approved by good works, if she has brought up children, if she has been hospitable to strangers, if she has washed the saints’ feet, if she has relieved the afflicted, and if she has diligently followed every good work.

pairs.source: Maꞌ yaꞌ kibalot janda deꞌ aluaꞌ mudaꞌ daang ituang inoh.   Dop-e jak yoh aluaꞌ suka ngilipuang dali, yoh moꞌ yaꞌ kawin baꞌuh duoh diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ layan Kristus, kodaꞌ janyi-e.
pairs.target: But refuse younger widows, for when they have grown wanton against Christ, they desire to marry;

pairs.source: Moꞌ-e wat inoh, iyoh yaꞌ obuah ngukum, dop-e moꞌ ngilangal janyi-e tuduꞌ Topaꞌ.
pairs.target: having condemnation, because they have rejected their first pledge.

pairs.source: Wat noh geh janda deꞌ mudaꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ saꞌat masa ngan-e molot luah boli nyaꞌa.   Deꞌ lobih jaꞌat-e lagiꞌ, yoh suka kilakal nyaꞌa, suka sapul hal nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon, duoh suka kilakal oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e patut nyeꞌ yaꞌ kilakal-e.
pairs.target: Besides, they also learn to be idle, going about from house to house. Not only idle, but also gossips and busybodies, saying things which they ought not.

pairs.source: Noh leh ngan okuꞌ odaꞌ janda-janda deꞌ aluaꞌ mudaꞌ kawin baꞌuh, saꞌ-e ogiꞌ onak-e, duoh ngatul lomin boli-e, saꞌ nyaꞌa diꞌ-e ponai pijaꞌat adon otoꞌ ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ.
pairs.target: I desire therefore that the younger widows marry, bear children, rule the household, and give no occasion to the adversary for insulting.

pairs.source: Dop-e moꞌ ogiꞌ janda-janda deꞌ mudaꞌ deꞌ moyap soꞌ olan deꞌ bonal yohmoꞌ nunaꞌ Laja Muat.
pairs.target: For already some have turned away after Satan.

pairs.source: Simoꞌ-e ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ dali bait deꞌ dayung deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus Yesus, yoh ogiꞌ madih-e deꞌ moꞌ janda, yoh halus tulung madih-e deꞌ janda inoh.   Saꞌ uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ diꞌ-e ngilaan idip madih-e deꞌ janda inoh duoh tulung-e.   Tanah saꞌ ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ bokon tulung janda-janda deꞌ doiꞌ madih ayua-e deꞌ yaꞌ ngilaan idip-e.
pairs.target: If any man or woman who believes has widows, let them relieve them, and don’t let the assembly be burdened; that it might relieve those who are widows indeed.

pairs.source: Pimipin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ paguh kiloja-e, patut nyeꞌ ngin pah duwoh sidoh bogoꞌ daꞌ-a, amot-e odop-e deꞌ bonal-bonal magah pingunang Topaꞌ duoh ngajal suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ bonal.
pairs.target: Let the elders who rule well be counted worthy of double honor, especially those who labor in the word and in teaching.

pairs.source: Dop-e ogiꞌ deꞌ moꞌ obuah nulis daang buk Kitab deꞌ in-e, “Sapi deꞌ julah-e ngiik gandum maꞌ yaꞌ mokos bobaꞌ-e.” Ogiꞌ geh deꞌ obuah nulis in-e, “Nyaꞌa deꞌ kiloja, iyoh patut tilimaꞌ pah-e.”
pairs.target: For the Scripture says, “You shall not muzzle the ox when it treads out the grain.” And, “The laborer is worthy of his wages.”

pairs.source: Maꞌ yaꞌ bisayaꞌ simoꞌ-e ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ napo pimipin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ, asal-e diꞌ-e duwoh taluh naꞌan deꞌ ningaꞌ, deꞌ tanon oniꞌ deꞌ napo-e inoh tok.
pairs.target: Don’t receive an accusation against an elder, except at the word of two or three witnesses.

pairs.source: Nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ nai dosa-e, halus nyeꞌ ngalah-e deꞌ sulung jowin uluk ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ, saꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon tolu.
pairs.target: Those who sin, reprove in the sight of all, that the rest also may be in fear.

pairs.source: Deꞌ sulung jowin Topaꞌ, Kristus Yesus, duoh malaikat-malaikat deꞌ moꞌ pilih-E, okuꞌ ulih-ulih mitiaꞌ saꞌ muꞌu nunaꞌ sibaya deꞌ munoꞌ: maꞌ dioꞌ pikil jaꞌat tuduꞌ osi-osi-e, duoh maꞌ yaꞌ ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ nuaꞌ nyeꞌ.
pairs.target: I command you in the sight of God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, and the chosen angels, that you observe these things without prejudice, doing nothing by partiality.

pairs.source: Maꞌ yaꞌ bigaut posan tongan nyeꞌ deꞌ tun bak nyaꞌa, ngan nyeꞌ yaꞌ pakat-e odaꞌ jadin pilayan Topaꞌ.   Simoꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon nai dosa-e, maꞌ yaꞌ suwaꞌ duoh dosa deꞌ nai-e.   Jaga odop muꞌ saꞌ muꞌ totap bisig.
pairs.target: Lay hands hastily on no one, neither be a participant in other men’s sins. Keep yourself pure.

pairs.source: Timotius, maꞌ yaꞌ jok nyeꞌ nuak piꞌin sajaꞌ neh, nuak nyeꞌ geh ngaꞌ sit tuak anggul ngan nyeꞌ jaga aang toꞌin muꞌ, dop-e muꞌu lika monam.
pairs.target: Be no longer a drinker of water only, but use a little wine for your stomach’s sake and your frequent infirmities.

pairs.source: Ogiꞌ kudu-kudu nyaꞌa dosa-e moꞌ dioꞌ tonga, pak-e ogiꞌ geh dosa nyaꞌa deꞌ tiaꞌ ke yoh moꞌ tonga takal nyaꞌa moꞌ ngukum-e.
pairs.target: Some men’s sins are evident, preceding them to judgment, and some also follow later.

pairs.source: Wat noh geh ogiꞌ pingunai deꞌ paguh deꞌ lasuꞌ tonga.   Deꞌ diꞌ-e mulah yaꞌ tonga, nyuang-nyuang-e tuang tonga geh.
pairs.target: In the same way also there are good works that are obvious, and those that are otherwise can’t be hidden.

pairs.source: Ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ jadin kuli, halus pimodo tuduꞌ toke-e, saꞌ-a doiꞌ nyaꞌa dapod pijaꞌat adon Topaꞌ duoh suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ ngajal toꞌ.
pairs.target: Let as many as are bondservants under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honor, that the name of God and the doctrine not be blasphemed.

pairs.source: Simoꞌ toke-e nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ bisayaꞌ, maꞌ yaꞌ diꞌ nyeꞌ totu yaꞌ pimodo tuduꞌ-e, dop-e yoh samah-samah ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus.   Sipatut-e kuli-e layan toke-e lobih paguh-e lagiꞌ, dop-e toke-e samah-samah ulang deꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ ngibalaꞌ-e.   Suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ mutiꞌ halus muꞌ ngajal duoh sibaya-e.
pairs.target: Those who have believing masters, let them not despise them, because they are brothers, but rather let them serve them, because those who partake of the benefit are believing and beloved. Teach and exhort these things.

pairs.source: Simoꞌ ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ ngajal oniꞌ deꞌ bokon, deꞌ diꞌ-e situju duoh ajal deꞌ bonal deꞌ soꞌ Topaꞌ otoꞌ Yesus Kristus, duoh deꞌ ngajal agama otoꞌ,
pairs.target: If anyone teaches a different doctrine, and doesn’t consent to sound words, the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the doctrine which is according to godliness,

pairs.source: yoh bilagah odop-e nang odop-e puꞌan suaꞌ oniꞌ, pak-e doiꞌ-e nak puꞌan oni-oni-e! Otin-e kolas, suka bikaꞌi, bikalah, kalik oniꞌ deꞌ odaꞌ nyaꞌa yaꞌ siniaꞌ, odaꞌ yoh bilawan tipan odop-e, buꞌui diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ tikuluk, pinapo, salah sakaꞌ,
pairs.target: he is conceited, knowing nothing, but obsessed with arguments, disputes, and word battles, from which come envy, strife, insulting, evil suspicions,

pairs.source: diꞌ-e mokuaꞌ-mokuaꞌ bikalah.   Nyaꞌa deꞌ wat inoh pikil-e moꞌ lusak diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ bonal.   Yoh pikil nang nyaꞌa ponai kaya odaꞌ agama.
pairs.target: constant friction of people of corrupt minds and destitute of the truth, who suppose that godliness is a means of gain. Withdraw yourself from such.

pairs.source: Tok utung ayuh deꞌ soꞌon nyeꞌ soꞌ agama moꞌ nyeꞌ nunaꞌ pingajal-e.   Wat noh geh nyeꞌ soꞌon utung ayuh, moꞌ nyeꞌ puas otin duoh oniꞌ deꞌ ogiꞌ deꞌ kakuꞌ nyeꞌ.
pairs.target: But godliness with contentment is great gain.

pairs.source: Dop-e takal otoꞌ nog kaang dunia, doiꞌ oni-oni-e deꞌ toban toꞌ, wat inoh geh doiꞌ oni-oni-e deꞌ tapod otoꞌ toban-e takal otoꞌ togan dunia itih.
pairs.target: For we brought nothing into the world, and we certainly can’t carry anything out.

pairs.source: Asal-e moꞌ ogiꞌ pinguman duoh pimakai toꞌ inoh moꞌ sukup.
pairs.target: But having food and clothing, we will be content with that.

pairs.source: Pak-e nyaꞌa deꞌ idip-e jok-e ngan-e yaꞌ jadin kaya lobih-lobih, yoh sonang obuah ngijaꞌ duoh obuah jolat deꞌ masam-masam soꞌ niat-e deꞌ budua duoh deꞌ kanam pijolaꞌ odop-e.   Suaꞌ niat-e deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ odaꞌ idip-e asul duoh mutuab.
pairs.target: But those who are determined to be rich fall into a temptation and a snare and many foolish and harmful lusts, such as drown men in ruin and destruction.

pairs.source: Dop-e sikiya bakoꞌ duoh duit moꞌ odaꞌ timul masam-masam oniꞌ deꞌ jaꞌat deꞌ nai nyaꞌa.   Bogoꞌ geh nyaꞌa deꞌ sape obuaꞌ togan ajal deꞌ bonal diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ bisayaꞌ, ngan-e ngajah duit, yoh moꞌ obuah susah jolaꞌ deꞌ ngasul otin kila-e.
pairs.target: For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil. Some have been led astray from the faith in their greed, and have pierced themselves through with many sorrows.

pairs.source: Pak-e muꞌu nyaꞌa deꞌ moꞌ kakuꞌ Topaꞌ, maꞌ yaꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ wat inoh, juuaꞌ-juuaꞌ nyeꞌ soꞌ-e.   Odaꞌ leh odop muꞌ jadin nyaꞌa deꞌ bonal deꞌ boton Topaꞌ, deꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ laꞌan Topaꞌ, bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus, ngibalaꞌ tipan odop nyeꞌ manusia, taan sabal daang susah jolaꞌ, duoh diꞌ nyeꞌ posual tuduꞌ nyaꞌa.
pairs.target: But you, man of God, flee these things, and follow after righteousness, godliness, faith, love, perseverance, and gentleness.

pairs.source: Bijuang bonal-bonal saꞌ muꞌu telus bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus, saꞌ muꞌ soꞌon idip duoh Topaꞌ nah-nah.   Dop-e saꞌan inoh leh Topaꞌ mogan muꞌu takal muꞌ moꞌ ngakuꞌ nang odop muꞌ bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus deꞌ sulung jowin nyaꞌa deꞌ bogoꞌ.
pairs.target: Fight the good fight of faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called, and you confessed the good confession in the sight of many witnesses.

pairs.source: Deꞌ sulung jowin Topaꞌ deꞌ ngin asong tuduꞌ suaꞌ oniꞌ odaꞌ idip duoh deꞌ sulung jowin Kristus Yesus deꞌ moꞌ tanon oniꞌ deꞌ bonal tuduꞌ Pontius Pilatus, okuꞌ mitiaꞌ itih deꞌ soꞌ muꞌu:
pairs.target: I command you before God, who gives life to all things, and before Christ Jesus, who before Pontius Pilate testified the good confession,

pairs.source: Nunaꞌ leh bonal-bonal-e sibaya deꞌ moꞌ tanon kuꞌ, maꞌ ogiꞌ deꞌ supiah nyeꞌ sape nog Topaꞌ Yesus Kristus paliꞌ baꞌuh.
pairs.target: that you keep the commandment without spot, blameless, until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ;

pairs.source: Iyoh yaꞌ nog daang masa deꞌ pas deꞌ moꞌ notap odop Topaꞌ.   Iyoh deꞌ nguasa suaꞌ oniꞌ duoh patut nyeꞌ mudi-E, Iyoh Laja susuaꞌ laja, Iyoh Toke susuaꞌ toke .
pairs.target: which in its own times he will show, who is the blessed and only Ruler, the King of kings, and Lord of lords;

pairs.source: Jok-e Iyoh sijaꞌ-e Topaꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e ponai kobos, Iyoh idip daang jawaꞌ deꞌ doiꞌ nyaꞌa ponai odi sinok-e.   Aluaꞌ doiꞌ nyaꞌa ponai kilin Iyoh duoh diꞌ nyaꞌa tungang kilin-E.   Tuduꞌ Iyoh sijaꞌ-e suaꞌ pudi duoh jok-e Iyoh deꞌ ogiꞌ kuasa-E nah-nah! Amin.
pairs.target: who alone has immortality, dwelling in unapproachable light; whom no man has seen, nor can see: to whom be honor and eternal power. Amen.

pairs.source: Tanon tuduꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ kaya daang dunia itih, maꞌ yaꞌ samuh lawa duoh maꞌ yaꞌ bialap tuduꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e totu kodaꞌ halta.   Nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ halus bialap tuduꞌ Topaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ ngin suaꞌ oniꞌ tuduꞌ otoꞌ, deꞌ diꞌ-e obuaꞌ-obuaꞌ odaꞌ otoꞌ man pakai-e.
pairs.target: Charge those who are rich in this present world that they not be haughty, nor have their hope set on the uncertainty of riches, but on the living God, who richly provides us with everything to enjoy;

pairs.source: Tanon tuduꞌ odop-e deꞌ munoꞌ odaꞌ nai oniꞌ deꞌ paguh, bogoꞌ nai pingunai kiloja deꞌ paguh, suka tulung duoh ngin oni sijaꞌ-a deꞌ nyaꞌa.
pairs.target: that they do good, that they be rich in good works, that they be ready to distribute, willing to share;

pairs.source: Moꞌ-e moꞌ wat inoh, nyaꞌa deꞌ munoꞌ moꞌ nguluk halta deꞌ jadin olan deꞌ paguh saꞌan onu deꞌ yaꞌ nog.   Moꞌ-e moꞌ wat inoh, yoh yaꞌ soꞌon idip duoh Topaꞌ nah-nah, idip deꞌ sibonal-e.
pairs.target: laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come, that they may lay hold of eternal life.

pairs.source: Timotius, jaga bonal-bonal-e suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ odaꞌ Topaꞌ muꞌu nai-e, tolan juuaꞌ-juuaꞌ-e sina deꞌ doiꞌ guna-e, duoh suaꞌ sina bikalah tentang suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ diꞌ-e bonal deꞌ nang nyaꞌa pingajal pak-e idoh.
pairs.target: Timothy, guard that which is committed to you, turning away from the empty chatter and oppositions of what is falsely called knowledge;

pairs.source: Dop-e ogiꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ ngajal pingajal itih, yohmoꞌ diꞌ-e tiyaꞌ bisayaꞌ deꞌ pingajal deꞌ bonal soꞌ agama deꞌ dioꞌ soꞌ kanoꞌ geh yoh bisayaꞌ daꞌ-a.   Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ bilokat suaꞌ ingan.   Soꞌ okuꞌ, Paulus.     TIMOTIUS
pairs.target: which some profess, and thus have wandered from the faith. Grace be with you. Amen.
Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, according to the promise of the life which is in Christ Jesus,

pairs.source: Sulat itih soꞌ okuꞌ, Paulus, rasul Kristus Yesus, deꞌ moꞌ obuah pilih odop Topaꞌ, odaꞌ okuꞌ tukang tanon tentang idip deꞌ moꞌ janyi-E, idip deꞌ soꞌon toꞌ, moꞌ otoꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus.   Okuꞌ nulis sulat itih tuduꞌ muꞌu Timotius, deꞌ ngibalaꞌ kuꞌ, deꞌ ngakuꞌ kuꞌ nyam onak odop kuꞌ.   Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ Samaꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus Topaꞌ otoꞌ ngin bilokat, pilasiꞌ, duoh idip bidanah tuduꞌ muꞌu.
pairs.target: to Timothy, my beloved child: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bisukul tuduꞌ Topaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ layan kuꞌ daang otin kila deꞌ bisig, samah kodaꞌ deꞌ moꞌ nai sumuk babai kuꞌ noꞌuh-e.   Singonu bait singalom tibilang kuꞌ bidoa okuꞌ silalu natong muꞌu.
pairs.target: I thank God, whom I serve as my forefathers did, with a pure conscience. How unceasing is my memory of you in my petitions, night and day

pairs.source: Okuꞌ natong piꞌin boton muꞌ obuaꞌ timatiag takal otoꞌ bitogan.   Yoh ngan kuꞌ linuꞌ yaꞌ bitapod duoh muꞌu saꞌ otin kuꞌ bonal-bonal sonang.
pairs.target: longing to see you, remembering your tears, that I may be filled with joy;

pairs.source: Okuꞌ natong muꞌu bonal-bonal bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Kristus, samah kodaꞌ sumuk muꞌ Lois duoh sinoꞌ muꞌ Eunike.   Okuꞌ bisayaꞌ nang muꞌu tuang wat inoh geh.
pairs.target: having been reminded of the sincere faith that is in you; which lived first in your grandmother Lois, and your mother Eunice, and, I am persuaded, in you also.

pairs.source: Inoh leh ngan okuꞌ odaꞌ muꞌu paliꞌ kidip baꞌuh oniꞌ deꞌ paguh deꞌ ngin Topaꞌ tuduꞌ muꞌu takal kuꞌ posan tongan kuꞌ tun muꞌu.
pairs.target: For this cause, I remind you that you should stir up the gift of God which is in you through the laying on of my hands.

pairs.source: Dop-e Iyang deꞌ ngin Topaꞌ tuduꞌ otoꞌ, idoh diꞌ-e Iyang deꞌ odaꞌ otoꞌ tolu, pak-e Iyang deꞌ odaꞌ otoꞌ makin togap, ngibalaꞌ suaꞌ nyaꞌa duoh taan nijon odop toꞌ.
pairs.target: For God didn’t give us a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and self-control.

pairs.source: Yoh ngan-e maꞌ yaꞌ dasaꞌ magah gah Topaꞌ otoꞌ, duoh maꞌ yaꞌ dasaꞌ ngalun okuꞌ deꞌ obuah jel luban kuꞌ nai kiloja saꞌan Topaꞌ.   Pak-e pakai leh kuasa soꞌ odop Topaꞌ, suwaꞌ leh susah jolaꞌ ngan nyeꞌ magah Gah deꞌ Paguh kodaꞌ okuꞌ.
pairs.target: Therefore don’t be ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner; but endure hardship for the Good News according to the power of God,

pairs.source: Topaꞌ nyilamat duoh mogan otoꞌ saꞌ otoꞌ idip jok-e saꞌan Iyoh.   Iyoh nai suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ munoꞌ idoh diꞌ-e ningaꞌ soꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ nai otoꞌ, pak-e nunaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ laꞌan odop Topaꞌ duoh Otin Topaꞌ deꞌ paguh, deꞌ tanon-E tuduꞌ otoꞌ pakai Kristus Yesus takal dunia itih aluaꞌ doiꞌ.
pairs.target: who saved us and called us with a holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given to us in Christ Jesus before times eternal,

pairs.source: Adin Topaꞌ moꞌ bitanga tuduꞌ otoꞌ Otin-E deꞌ paguh inoh, takal Laja Pinyilamat Kristus Yesus nog.   Yoh moꞌ ngasul kuasa deꞌ odaꞌ nyaꞌa kobos, pakai Gah deꞌ Paguh inoh leh Iyoh tanon idip duoh Topaꞌ nah-nah.
pairs.target: but has now been revealed by the appearing of our Savior, Christ Jesus, who abolished death, and brought life and immortality to light through the Good News.

pairs.source: Topaꞌ moꞌ pilih okuꞌ odaꞌ jadin rasul-E duoh gulu deꞌ tukang magah Gah deꞌ Paguh.
pairs.target: For this, I was appointed as a preacher, an apostle, and a teacher of the Gentiles.

pairs.source: Inoh leh luban idip kuꞌ jolaꞌ wat itih neh, pak-e okuꞌ diꞌ kuꞌ dasaꞌ, dop-e okuꞌ puꞌan tuduꞌ osi soꞌ kuꞌ naꞌ kila kuꞌ.   Okuꞌ bisayaꞌ Iyoh tapod jaga suaꞌ oniꞌ deꞌ moꞌ ngin-E tuduꞌ okuꞌ nog takal-E yaꞌ nog baꞌuh.
pairs.target: For this cause I also suffer these things. Yet I am not ashamed, for I know him whom I have believed, and I am persuaded that he is able to guard that which I have committed to him against that day.

pairs.source: Kagian togap-togap-e tuduꞌ pingajal deꞌ bonal deꞌ moꞌ tanon kuꞌ tuduꞌ muꞌu.   Totap bisayaꞌ tuduꞌ Topaꞌ, ngibalaꞌ geh nyaꞌa deꞌ bokon dop-e otoꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus.
pairs.target: Hold the pattern of sound words which you have heard from me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

pairs.source: Jaga bonal-bonal-e oniꞌ deꞌ sukup paguh deꞌ moꞌ ngin Topaꞌ tuduꞌ otoꞌ, pakai Iyang-E deꞌ ogiꞌ daang idip otoꞌ.
pairs.target: That good thing which was committed to you, guard through the Holy Spirit who dwells in us.

pairs.source: Muꞌu tuang puꞌan geh nang suaꞌ nyaꞌa deꞌ Asia moꞌ diꞌ-e piduli okuꞌ, kodaꞌ Figelus duoh Hermogenes.
pairs.target: This you know, that all who are in Asia turned away from me; of whom are Phygelus and Hermogenes.

pairs.source: Okuꞌ bidoa saꞌ Topaꞌ ngin pilasiꞌ-E tuduꞌ lawang Onesiforus, dop-e takal okuꞌ daang jel yoh diꞌ-e dasaꞌ odi ningaꞌ okuꞌ.
pairs.target: May the Lord grant mercy to the house of Onesiphorus, for he often refreshed me, and was not ashamed of my chain,

pairs.source: Takal yoh nog keꞌ Roma yoh moꞌ lasuꞌ kalik okuꞌ, nog-e bitapod duoh okuꞌ.
pairs.target: but when he was in Rome, he sought me diligently, and found me

pairs.source: Muꞌu tuang puꞌan muꞌ geh takal deꞌ Efesus yoh bogoꞌ sidoh-e tulung okuꞌ.   Saꞌ Topaꞌ ngin pilasiꞌ-E tuduꞌ-e takal onu Topaꞌ deꞌ yaꞌ nog.
pairs.target: (the Lord grant to him to find the Lord’s mercy in that day); and in how many things he served at Ephesus, you know very well.

pairs.source: Timotius deꞌ ngakuꞌ kuꞌ nyam onak odop kuꞌ, muꞌu halus silalu nogap odop muꞌ dop-e Otin Topaꞌ deꞌ Paguh moꞌ soꞌon toꞌ takal otoꞌ idip niꞌ duoh Kristus Yesus.
